1.intro: Utsicbal Lehi, Sariah u yatan, yétel u cantúl palaloʼob, u kabaʼoʼobeʼ, (cu cáhal tac tú maʼs nohochileʼ) Laman, Lemuel, Sam yétel Nefi. Cu túxtaal aʼalbil tiʼ Lehi tumen Yumtsileʼ ca hókoc tu luʼumil Jerusalen, tumen letiʼ tún aʼalic le baʼax bín úchuc tu cahal tu yoʼolal u kebanoʼob, le betiʼqueʼ tán u yilicoʼob bix únchac u quínsicoʼob letiʼ. Ichil óxpʼél kineʼ tán u bin chén ich kax yétel u yét lákiloʼob. Nefieʼ, sunah tu luʼumil Jerusalen yétel u sucuʼunoʼob, tu yoʼolal u chʼaʼic u dzíbtaan tsicbalil le judioʼoboʼ. U tsicbalil u hach mukyahoʼob. Cu dzoʼocol u beloʼob yétel u xchʼupul palal Ismaʼel. Cu hókoloʼobeʼ cah binoʼob nách ich kax yétel u yet lákiloʼob. U mukyah ich kaxoʼ. Le tuʼuxoʼob maʼn ich kaxoʼ. Cu kuchuloʼob tiʼ le nucuch haʼoʼoboʼ. U sucuʼunoʼob Nefieʼ ca hoʼopʼ u kuxiloʼob yétel letiʼ. Letiʼ cu sutiʼc yóloʼobeʼ ca tu mentah humpʼél cheʼm. Ca tu dzahoʼob u kabaʼ le cúchiloʼ Yaʼabil Yan. Cu maʼnoʼob chúmuc le nucuch haʼoʼoboʼ cah kuchoʼob tiʼ le tuʼux aʼalaʼan ca dzaʼabac tiʼoʼob. Lelaʼ hach heʼebix tsolaʼanil tumen Nefieʼ wá xaniʼ, ten Nefieʼ, tiʼn dzíbtah le tsicbalaʼ.
1.1: Ten Nefieneʼ, h síheʼn tiʼ hach utsil tatatsiloʼob, ca tún cambalnahaʼanen tiʼ tulácal u naʼatiʼl in tata; beyoʼ in wilmaʼh yaʼabach yayah ólaloʼob tiʼ tulácal u kinil in cuxtal, quex beyoʼ in kammaʼh xan yaʼabach utsiloʼob tiʼ Yumtsil tulácal u kiniloʼob in cuxtal; hach beyoʼ in wohél maʼalob u yutsil Hahal Dios yétel le baʼax maʼ oheʼltaanoʼ, le betiʼc tún quiʼn dzíbtiʼc u tsicbalil baʼax úch tiʼ in cuxtaliʼl.
1.2: Beyoʼ quʼn dzíbtiʼc le cuentoaʼ ichil u tʼan in tata, ich le tʼanoʼ yan u caʼansahil le judioʼoboʼ yétel u tʼanil le Egiptoiloʼoboʼ.
1.3: In wohél xaneʼ le tsicbal quiʼn dzíbtiʼcaʼ hach u hahil; yétel xan quiʼn dzíbtiʼc tiʼn kabil ten heʼebix u bin le baʼax in wohéloʼoboʼ.
1.4: Cah úch tún utiaʼal u cáhbal u yáx haʼabil u betiʼc u nohchilil Zedequiʼasoʼ, u reyil Judaeʼ (in tata Lehieʼ cahaʼan tiʼ Jerusalen tulácal u kinil u cuxtaleʼ); beyoʼ, h kuchoʼob yaʼabach profetaoʼob ich le cahoʼ ca u pʼatoʼob u kebanoʼob le maʼcoʼob teʼ cahoʼ wá maʼeʼ u noh cahil Jerusalen yan u xuʼulsaʼal.
1.5: Ca tún h úcheʼ, Lehi in tataeʼ, hókeʼ cah orarnah tiʼ Yumtsil, beyoʼ, yétel tulácal yól u pucsiʼkal, tu yoʼolal u cahal.
1.6: Caʼaliquiʼl tán u orar tiʼ Yumtsileʼ, cah chícpah actán tiʼ humpʼél caʼanal kák yókol humpʼél tunicheʼ; tiʼ hach yaʼabil le baʼax tu yilah yétel tu yuʼubahoʼ; ca hoʼopʼ u sén quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl tu yoʼolal le baʼax tu yilah yétel tu yuʼubahoʼ.
1.7: Le ca tún h sunah tu yotoch ich Jerusaleneʼ cah lúb yókol u camaʼ tumen chup u yól yétel u pixanil Dios tu yoʼolal le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc u yilicoʼ.
1.8: Ca tún chup u yól bey yétel le pixanoʼ cah bisaʼab tiʼ humpʼél baʼax dzaʼan ilbil tiʼ tumen Dios, tiʼ tu yilah u heʼebpahal le caʼanoʼoboʼ ca tu tuculaheʼ tán u yilic Hahal Dios culucbal tu tronoil, baʼpachtaan tumen yaʼabach angeloʼob tán u kayoʼob, tán u quiʼquiʼtʼantiʼcoʼob Hahal Dios.
1.9: Ca tún tu yilah u yémel tiʼ caʼan huntúl maʼc maʼs cu lémbal que le kinoʼ le can anac tu chúmuquiʼl caʼan.
1.10: Ca tu yilah xaneʼ cu taloʼob tu pach letiʼ ulak doce maʼcoʼob beyoʼ maʼs hach cu lémbaloʼob tiʼ le estrellaoʼob yan teʼ caʼanoʼ.
1.11: Ca tún h émoʼobeʼ cah binoʼob yókolcab; u yáx huntúleʼ h tal cah wáʼalah tu tánil in tataeʼ ca tu dzah humpʼél libro tiʼ, tán u yaʼalic tiʼ ca u xoqueʼ.
1.12: Caʼaliquiʼl tún tán u xoquiʼqueʼ cah chuʼup yétel u Pixanil Yumtsil.
1.13: Cah xocnah tán u yaʼalic: Ótsilech, ótsilech Jerusalen, tumen dzoʼoc in wilic a kebanoʼob. Beyoʼ in tataeʼ tu xocah yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tu yoʼolal Jerusalen, bix bín xuʼulsaʼac yétel u maʼquiʼloʼob cahaʼanoʼob tiʼ; yaʼab tiʼoʼob xan bin quínsaʼacoʼob yétel tadz maʼscab; yétel yaʼab tiʼoʼob xan bín bisaʼac esclavoiʼ tiʼ Babiloniaiʼ.
1.14: Le ca tún h dzoʼoc u xoc in tata yétel u yilic yaʼabach nuctac baʼaloʼob cu haʼaksic yóleʼ, ca hoʼopʼ u kaʼam aʼalic tiʼ Yumtsil beyaʼ: Hach nuctac a meyahoʼob Yumtsil Hahal Dios yan tulácal páhtalil tiʼ tech, hach cu háksic in wól. A tronoeʼ tyaʼan tu caʼanalil teʼ caʼanoʼoboʼ, yétel ca chʼaʼic ótsilil tu yókol u maʼquiʼloʼob cahaʼan ich luʼum, yétel tumen ca chʼaʼic ótsilileʼ maʼ bin a chaʼ u xuʼulsaʼal le maʼxoʼob cu nadzcubaoʼob ta wicnaloʼ.
1.15: Bey u tʼan in tata ichil u quiʼquiʼtʼan tiʼ Hahal Dios; tumen hach cu quiʼmaʼcchahal u yól, yétel u pucsíkcaleʼ hach cu chuʼupul tu yoʼolal le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc u yilicoʼ, beyoʼ, le baʼaloʼoboʼ h eʼesaʼab tiʼ tumen Yumtsil.
1.16: Ten Nefieneʼ, maʼ tu páhtal in tsolic hach chucaʼan le baʼaxoʼob tu dzíbtah in tataoʼ, tumen yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tu dzíbtah xan heʼebix ie baʼax dzaʼan ilbil tiʼ tumen Diosoʼ yétel le baʼax h chícpah tiʼ le tán u weneloʼ; beyxann u dzíbtmaʼh yaʼab baʼaxoʼob u yaʼalmaʼh bín úchuc, ca tu yaʼalah tiʼ u palaloʼoboʼ, leloʼobaʼ maʼ tán in tsolic tulácal.
1.17: Beyoʼ, bín in caʼah in dzíbt le baʼax úch tenoʼ tu kinil in cuxtal ten. Heʼel túnaʼ bin caʼah in tsol le baʼaxoʼob tu betah in tata yókol le laminaoʼob in betmaʼh yétel in kaboʼob tenoʼ, cu dzoʼocol in tsolic humpʼít u tsicbalil in tataeʼ quiʼn dzíbtiʼc u tsicbalil in cuxtal ten.
1.18: Le betiʼc túneʼ in kát ca a wohéltiʼqueʼexeʼ, le cah dzoʼoc u yilaʼal le nuctac baʼaloʼob tumen in tataoʼ hach sén hakaʼan yóleʼ Yumtsileʼ tu yeʼesah tiʼ baʼax cun úchul utiaʼal u xuʼulsaʼal Jerusalen; heʼel túnaʼ cah hók ichil le cahoʼ ca hoʼopʼ u yaʼalic tiʼoʼob baʼax bín úchuc yétel le baʼax dzoʼoc u yilic yétel le cu yuʼubicoʼ.
1.19: Le tún le Judioʼoboʼ ca hoʼopʼ yaʼalic baʼal tu yoʼolal le baʼaxoʼob cu yaʼalic tiʼoʼoboʼ, tumen hach tu hahileʼ tu yaʼalah tiʼoʼob le kebanoʼob cu betiʼcoʼoboʼ; ca xan tu yaʼalah u hahil tʼan tiʼoʼobeʼ, le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc u yilic yétel dzoʼoc u yuʼubicoʼ, beyxann le baʼax tu xocah teʼ librooʼ, cu yeʼesicoʼob u tal le Mesiasoʼ yétel u lubsic u kebanoʼob yókolcab.
1.20: Le Judioʼoboʼ le ca tu yuʼubahoʼob le baʼaloʼobaʼ ca kuxilnahoʼob tiʼ heʼebix tu betahiloʼob yétel le profetaoʼob tiʼ le úchben kinoʼoboʼ, le maʼxoʼob dzoʼoc u puʼulul ichil le cahoʼ, dzoʼoc u chʼiʼinchʼiʼinaʼaloʼob yétel u quínsaʼaloʼob; hach beyxannoʼ tun yilicoʼob bix u quínsicoʼob in tata ca u chʼaʼicoʼob u cuxtal. Baʼaleʼ ten Nefieneʼ, bin in weʼes teʼex cu hach chʼaʼic ótsilil Yumtsil tiʼ le maʼxoʼob dzoʼoc u yéyic tu yoʼolal hach toh u cuxtaloʼob, ca u dzaʼ páhtalil tiʼoʼob utiaʼal u pʼatoʼob le u baʼal kasoʼoboʼ.

2.1: Tumen úch beyoʼ, Yumtsileʼ tu tʼanah in tata, beyoʼ, tu tʼanah tiʼ le tán u weneloʼ tán u yaʼalic tiʼ: Ca bendecirtaaquech Lehi tu yoʼolal le baʼax dzoʼoc a betiʼcoʼ, yétel tumen dzoʼoc a betiʼc in wólil, dzoʼoc xan a wáʼalic tiʼ le cahaʼ, le baʼax tiʼn wáʼalah techeʼ, heʼel túnaʼ tán u tuclicoʼob bix u quínsiquech.
2.2: Cah úch u yaʼalaʼal tiʼn tata ichil u weneleʼ ca xiʼic ich kax yétel tulácal u lákiloʼob.
2.3: Bey túnoʼ letiʼ tu betah u tʼan Yumtsil; le betiʼqueʼ tu betah le baʼax aʼalaʼab tiʼ tumen Yumtsil.
2.4: Bey túnoʼ cah hókeʼ cah bin ich kax ca tu pʼatah u yotoch, le luʼum dzaʼan tiʼ tumen u tataeʼ, u oro, u plata yétel baʼaloʼob hach coʼohtac u tohol; hach mixbaʼal tu chʼaʼah u biseʼ chén u lákoʼob, yétel baʼal u hanteʼ yétel u chan bisbil nah cah bin ich kax.
2.5: Le cah kuch tu haʼil le Mar Rojooʼ cah bin tiʼ le ich kax tac hach nadz tiʼ le kaʼnaboʼ, cah tún bin yétel u yatan u alal; yan Sariah, in maʼmaʼ yétel in sucuʼunoʼob maʼs nuctacoʼoboʼ, Laman, Lemuel yétel Sam.
2.6: Le ca tún betah teʼeloʼ humpʼél altar yétel tunichoʼobeʼ, ca tu dzah sacrificio tiʼ Yumtsil tán u dzaic diosboʼotiʼc tiʼ Yumtsil c Hahal Dios.
2.8: Le tún le rioaʼ cu hókol teʼ maʼr Rojooʼ tu dzah u kabaʼeʼ Laman; le xan le luʼumoʼ cu bin tu tsél le riooʼ cu kuchul tac hach nadz teʼ tuʼux cu lúbul le riooʼ ich le maʼroʼ.
2.9: Le ca tu yilah in tata u haʼil le rioaʼ cu kuchul teʼ Mar Rojooʼ, ca tu tʼanah Laman tán u yaʼalic tiʼ: Quexic ca beychaquech heʼebix le rioaʼ tán a kuchul maʼntadz tac tu tuʼuxil tulácal baʼax utsoʼ.
2.10: Ca tu yaʼalah xan tiʼ Lemueleʼ: Quexic ca beychaquech heʼebix le táx luʼumaʼ, maʼ tu lúbul a wól beyoʼ maʼ tu heʼlpahal a tucul a mentiʼc u tʼan Yumtsil.
2.11: Tʼanah beyoʼ tu yoʼolal tumen u sén chichil u pucsiʼkal Laman yétel Lemuel, tumen beyoʼ tán caʼach u mucul tʼanoʼob tu contra u tataoʼob tiʼ yaʼabach baʼaloʼob, tu yoʼolal u yilic baʼal tu wenelil yétel tu yoʼolal u hóksicoʼob tu luʼumiloʼob Jerusalen, tán u pʼatiʼcoʼob le luʼumoʼob dzaʼan tiʼoʼob tumen u tataoʼobeʼ, u oro, u plata yétel u baʼaloʼob hach coʼohtac ca xiʼicoʼob químil ich kaxoʼ. Cu yaʼalicoʼob de que tu mentah beyoʼ in tata tu yoʼolal u chocopolil yan tu tucul yétel tu yól.
2.12: Bey tún úchic u yantal u mucul tʼanoʼob Laman, in sucuʼun maʼs nohoch yétel Lemuel tu contra u tata. Tu betoʼob beyoʼ tumen maʼ u kahóloʼob le baʼaxoʼob mentaan tumen le Hahal Dios mentamaʼhil letiʼoʼoboʼ.
2.13: Mix xan tán u creertiʼcoʼobeʼ le noh cahal Jerusalenoʼ heʼel u páhtal u xuʼulsaʼal heʼebix aʼalaʼanil tumen le profetaoʼoboʼ yételeʼ beyoʼob heʼebix le Judioʼob Jerusaleniloʼob, tu yóltahoʼob u quínsoʼob in tataeʼ.
2.14: Ca tún antah u yúchuleʼ in tataeʼ chup yétel le Pixanoʼ h tʼanah yételoʼob tu táx luʼumil Lemuel, tiʼ hach yaʼabil páhtalil úchic u tʼaneʼ ca hoʼopʼ u quiʼquiʼlanquiʼloʼob tu tán, yételeʼ tu yaʼachʼeʼtah u kas tuculoʼob cah pʼátoʼob maʼ h tʼanahoʼob tu contraiʼ, le betiʼqueʼ tu betahoʼob le baʼax tu yaʼalahoʼ.
2.15: Ca cahlah tún in tataeʼ tiʼ humpʼél chan bisbil nah.
2.16: Ten, tún Nefieneʼ, tumen caʼach hach tanqueleneʼ, quex tumen caʼanal in baquel yétel hach nohoch in dzíbolal ca in kahólt u tuculoʼob Hahal Diosiʼ, ca tiʼn kátah kaʼam tiʼ Yumtsil, heʼel túnaʼ cah tal u xímbateneʼ ca tu dzah ól tiʼ ten ca in creert le baʼaxoʼob u yaʼalmaʼh in tataeʼ, bey túnoʼ maʼ tiʼn betah tu contra in tata heʼebix tu betiʼlac in sucuʼunoʼoboʼ.
2.17: Ca tiʼn tʼanah Sam, tán in wáʼalic tiʼ tulácal le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc u yeʼesic ten Yumtsil yétel u Hahil Pixanoʼ. Ca tún tu creertah in tʼanoʼoboʼ.
2.18: Baʼaleʼ Laman yétel Lemueleʼ maʼ tu yóltahoʼob u yuʼuboʼob baʼax quiʼn wáʼaliquiʼ, le betiʼc túneʼ yah in wól tu yoʼolal hach chich u pucsiʼkaloʼobeʼ ca tiʼn kátah tiʼ Yumtsil tu yoʼolaloʼob.
2.19: Ca tún tu yaʼalah ten Yumtsileʼ: Bendecirtaanech Nefi, tu yoʼolal a fe, tumen dzoʼoc a dzaic a wól a caxteʼn yétel tulácal a wól tiʼ a pucsiʼkal.
2.20: Wá xan ca dzoʼocsic in tʼanoʼobeʼ, bín yaʼabchaquech yétel bín bisaʼaqueʼex tiʼ humpʼél luʼum prometertaan, humpʼél luʼum in betmaʼh atiaʼalinteʼex, humpʼél luʼum yéyaʼan tu tánil ulak luʼumoob.
2.21: Wá xan a sucuʼunoʼob cu baʼateloʼob ta contraeʼ, bin puʼulucoʼob tu tán Yumtsil.
2.22: Wá tech ca betiʼc in tʼanoʼobeʼ, bin a betaba nohochil yétel hcambesahil tiʼ a sucuʼunoʼob.
2.23: Tumen heʼel túnaʼ le kin bín líkiʼcoʼob baʼatel tiʼn contraeʼ bín in wec kas tu yókoloʼob, yétel mix humpʼél páhtalil bín anac tiʼoʼob tu yókol a palaloʼob, chén wá xan letiʼoʼob cu líkiʼloʼob baʼatel tiʼn contra.
2.24: Wá tún a palaloʼob cu líkiʼloʼob baʼatel tiʼn contraeʼ, le u palaloʼoboʼ a sucuʼunoʼobeʼ letiʼoʼob cun baʼatelnacoʼob tu contra a palaloʼob utiaʼal u kaʼahsicoʼob.

3.1: Cu dzoʼocol in tʼan yétel Yumtsileʼ, ten Nefieneʼ cah sunaheʼn tu nahil in tata.
3.2: Heʼel túnaʼ ca tu tʼanaheʼneʼ ca tu yaʼalah, úch ten humpʼél tucul tiʼn wenel tuʼux cu yaʼalic ten Yumtsileʼ tech yétel a sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca caʼa sunaqueʼex Jerusalen.
3.3: Tumen Labaneʼ yan tiʼ le u dzíbtaan tsicbalil le Judioʼoboʼ bey heʼebix xan u tsoʼolol tiʼ maʼx síhic úchben tataoʼobeʼ, le tsicbaloʼ dzíbtaan yókol laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronce.
3.4: Le betiʼc túneʼ Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u yaʼalic ten decosque tech yétel a sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca anac a bineʼex tu yotoch Laban tu yoʼolal a wiliqueʼex a chʼaʼiqueʼex le dzíbtaan tsicbaloʼ ca a taseʼex wáy h kaxaʼ.
3.5: Heʼel túnaʼ a sucuʼunoʼobeʼ tán u mucul tʼantiʼcoʼob, tán u yaʼalicoʼobeʼ le baʼax quiʼn kátiʼc tiʼoʼoboʼ hach maʼ, baʼaleʼ maʼ ten kátiʼquiʼ, sino Yumtsil u yaʼalmaʼh.
3.6: Le betiʼc túneʼ in xíbpalecheʼ xen, Yumtsileʼ letiʼ heʼel u yántiʼquecheʼ tumen maʼ a wáʼalmaʼh baʼal tu contraiʼ.
3.7: Ten Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn núcah in tataeʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ: Heʼel in bineʼ yétel heʼel in betiʼc le baʼax dzoʼoc u yaʼalic Yumtsiloʼ, in woheʼleʼ, letiʼeʼ mix huntén cu yaʼalic humpʼél tʼan tiʼ u palal maʼcoʼob wá maʼ xan u betiʼc u behil utiaʼal u páhtal u betiʼcoʼob le baʼax u yaʼalmaʼhoʼ.
3.8: Heʼel túnaʼ in tataeʼ cah pʼát hach quiʼmaʼc u yól tu yoʼolal le baʼax tiʼn wáʼalahoʼ tumen tu naʼatah decosque Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u bendecirtiʼquen.
3.9: Bey túnoʼ in sucuʼunoʼob yétel teneʼ ca t cuchah c bisbil nah cah hoʼopʼ c xímbal ich kax utiaʼal c bin tu luʼumil Jerusalen.
3.10: Ca anchah tún c kuchul Jerusaleneʼ ca hoʼopʼ c tsicbal ichil t batsil.
3.11: Ca tún c ilic maʼx tiʼ ichiloʼon cun yantal u bin tu yéyah hundzít chan cheʼ cada huntúl yotoch Laban. Heʼel túnaʼ Lamaneʼ tu yéyah u maʼs chowáquiʼl, le betiʼqueʼ cah bin letiʼ tu yotoch Laban, cah tsicbalnah yétel caʼaliquiʼl tyaʼan culucbal tu yotoch.
3.12: Ca tún tu kátah tiʼ Labaneʼ le úchben tsicbaloʼob dzíbtaan yókol laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceoʼ, le yan tiʼ u tsoʼolol maʼx u úchben tatailoʼob in tata.
3.13: Heʼel túnaʼ Labaneʼ cah kuxilnahiʼ, ca tu pulah tu tánil cu dzoʼocoleʼ maʼ tu yót u kub tiʼ le dzíbtaan tsicbaloʼob tiʼoʼ. Ca tún tu yaʼalah tiʼ: Heʼel túnaʼ techeʼ ca woclic, bín in caʼah in quiʼnsech.
3.14: Chén baʼaleʼ Lamaneʼ h púdz tiʼeʼ ca tu tsolah toʼon baʼax h betaab tiʼ tumen Laban. Ca tún hoʼopʼ u yantal toʼon yayah ólal, in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ u kátoʼob sut tu yicnal in tata teʼ kaxoʼ.
3.15: Chén baʼaleʼ, heʼel túnaʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah: Tu hahil cuxaʼan Yumtsileʼ, tu hahil xan cuxaʼanoʼoneʼ, maʼ tán c sut tu yicnal c tata wá maʼ c betiʼc baʼax u yaʼalmaʼh toʼon Yumtsil.
3.16: Le betiʼc túneʼ coʼox dzic c ól utiaʼal c dzoʼocsic u heʼel túnaʼ, letiʼeʼ tu pʼatah plata, oro yétel tulácal u heʼheʼlásil ayikaliloʼob, yételeʼ u betmaʼh tulácal lelaʼ tu yoʼolal u betiʼc u tʼan Yumtsil.
3.17: Tumen u yoheʼl letiʼ decosque Jerusaleneʼ yan u xuʼulsaʼal tu yoʼolal u keban le maʼcoʼob cahacbaloʼoboʼ.
3.18: Heʼel túnaʼ, maʼ tu yóltahoʼob u kamoʼob u tʼan le profetaoʼoboʼ. Le betiʼqueʼ, wá ca pʼátac in tata caʼach teʼ luʼum le dzoʼoc u yaʼalaʼal tiʼ ca hókocoʼ, dzoʼoc u químil xan caʼacheʼ. Beyoʼ hach kabét caʼach ca lukuc tu cahal.
3.19: Heʼel túnaʼ hach bey u naʼatiʼl Hahal Dios ca c caxt le úchben tsicbaloʼ tu yoʼolal u páhtal c taaquiʼc chucaʼan utiaʼal u yilic c palal bix u tʼan c tataoʼob úchoʼ.
3.20: Bey heʼebix le tʼanoʼob aʼalaʼan tumen le hahil profetaoʼoboʼ le dzaʼan tiʼoʼob tumen u Pixan yétel u páhtalil Hahal Dios, desde cah betaab yókolcabeʼ tac behlaʼeʼ.
3.21: Bey tún úchic in tsolic tiʼn sucuʼunoʼob ca anac u dza u yóloʼob u betoʼob u tʼan Hahal Dios.
3.22: Ca tún anchah c bin teʼ t luʼumil pʼataan toʼon tumen c úchben ét lákiloʼoboʼ ca t láh bisah molah c oro, plata yétel tulácal c coʼocoʼoh baʼaxiʼloʼob.
3.23: Cu dzoʼocol c múchʼquiʼntiʼc le baʼaloʼobaʼ cah sunahoʼon tu yotoch Laban.
3.24: Le cah ocoʼon tuʼux yan Labanoʼ, ca t kátah tiʼ ca u dza toʼon le tsicbaloʼob dzíbtaan teʼ yókol le laminaoʼob mentaan tiʼ bronceoʼ, ca t aʼalah c dzaic c oro, c plata yétel tulácal c coʼocoʼoh baʼaloʼob utiaʼal bey c boʼotiʼc tiʼoʼ.
3.25: Le tún ca tu yilah yan c ayikalileʼ, Labaneʼ tu dzíboltah, tu yoʼolaleʼ ca tu hóksoʼon táncabeʼ ca tu túxtah u meyah maʼquiʼloʼob ca quínsaʼac ca páhchahac u pʼátal yétel c ayikalil.
3.26: Toʼon túneʼ cah púdzoʼon tiʼ u meyah maʼquiʼloʼob cah anchac c pʼatiʼc c ayikaliloʼobeʼ ca tu láh chʼaʼah Laban.
3.27: Toʼoneʼ cah púdzoʼoneʼ cah binoʼon ich kaxeʼ beyoʼ maʼ tu caxtoʼon u meyhuloʼob Labaniʼ, ca t taacahcba tiʼ u holil humpʼél nohoch tunich.
3.28: Laman túneʼ ca hach kuxinah tiʼn woʼolal yétel tu yoʼolal in tata, beyxann tu betah Lemueloʼ, tumen tu yuʼubah baʼax tu yaʼalah Laman. Le betiʼc túneʼ, Laman yétel Lemueleʼ, tu yaʼalahoʼob yaʼabach baʼal tiʼ toʼon u yídzinoʼonoʼobeʼ ca tu haʼahadzoʼonoʼob yétel hundzít cheʼ.
3.29: Caʼaliquiʼl tán u hadzicoʼonoʼob yétel le hundzít cheʼoʼ, heʼel túnaʼ h chícpah huntúl u angel Yumtsil tu tánoʼobeʼ cah aʼalaʼab tiʼoʼobʼ: Baʼaxtén ca hadziqueʼex a wídzineʼex yétel hundzít cheʼ? Maʼ wá a woheʼleʼex Yumtsil u yéymaʼhil letiʼ utiaʼal u betuba a nohochileʼex tu yoʼolal a kebaneʼexiʼ? Heʼel túnaʼ bín a caʼaheʼex sut Jerusaleneʼ ca kuʼubuc Laban ta kabeʼex tumen Yumtsil.
3.30: Le cah dzoʼoc u tʼan le angel t ételoʼ cah bini.
3.31: Le cah dzoʼoc u bin le angeloʼ, Laman yétel Lemueleʼ ca hoʼopʼ u yaʼalicoʼob baʼal tu caʼatén tán u yaʼalicoʼob: Bix cun h páhtal u kuʼubul Laban t kab tumen Yumtsil? Heʼel túnaʼ letiʼeʼ huntúl maʼc yan páhtalil tiʼ, heʼel tac u páhtal u túxtiʼc cincuenta maʼcoʼobeʼ, beyoʼ, heʼel tac u páhtal u quínsic cincuenta maʼcoʼobeʼ, baʼaxtén maʼ quínsicoʼon toʼon xan?

4.1: Ca tún h tʼanaheʼn tiʼn sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼob: Coʼoneʼex sut Jerusalen, coʼox dzic c ól utiaʼal c betiʼqueʼex u tʼan Yumtsil, tumen Letiʼeʼ maʼs yan u páhtahil tiʼ tulácal yókolcab. Beyoʼ maʼ wá yan u páhtalil tiʼ maʼs que tiʼ Laban yétel u cincuenta maʼquiʼloʼob yan tiʼ wá u diez u milil?
4.2: Coʼoneʼex túneʼ, ca anchahac c muk bey heʼebix Moiseseʼ, tumen letiʼeʼ, tu hahileʼ tu tʼanah u haʼil Mar Rojoeʼ ca tu hatsuba tu xnoʼoh yétel tu xdzíc cah maʼn c tataoʼobeʼ maʼ h baʼatel maʼc Faraoneʼ tán caʼach u chʼaʼapachtiʼcoʼobeʼ cah láh buʼuloʼob tiʼ Mar Rojooʼ.
4.3: Bey túnoʼ, teʼexeʼ hach a woheʼleʼex tu hahil le baʼaloʼobaʼ, a woheʼleʼex xan huntúl angel dzoʼoc u tʼaniqueʼex; bix tún u caʼapʼelchahal a wóleʼex? Coʼoneʼexiʼ tumen Yumtsileʼ heʼel u páhtal u yántiʼcoʼon heʼebix tu yántah c tataoʼobeʼ yétel heʼel u páhtal u xuʼulsic Laban heʼebix tu betah yételle Egiptoiloʼobeʼ.
4.4: Cu dzoʼocol in wáʼalic tiʼoʼob lelaʼ, cah kuxilnahoʼobeʼ lailiʼ u bin u mucul tʼanoʼobeʼ, baʼaleʼ h taloʼob tiʼn pach tac h kuchoʼon tu caʼanal pakil Jerusalen.
4.5: Dzoʼoc u yákabtal, ca tiʼn betah u taaquiʼcubaoʼob tu pach le pakoʼ. Cu dzoʼocol u taaquiʼcubaoʼobeʼ, ten Nefieneʼ, h oquen ichil le noh cahoʼ cah binen tu yotoch Laban.
4.6: Teneʼ tán tún in bineʼ tán in bin heʼebix u yaʼalaʼal ten tumen le Pixanoʼ, mix in woheʼleʼ baʼax u deber in betiʼc.
4.7: Quex beyoʼ h binen, le tún cah nadzen tu yotoch Labaneʼ tiʼn wilah huntúl maʼc lúbaʼan luʼum tánil tiʼ ten tumen calaʼan.
4.8: Le ca tiʼn nadzinbaeʼ ca tiʼn wilaheʼ le maʼcoʼ letiʼ Laban.
4.9: Le tún ca tiʼn wilah u tadz maʼscabileʼ ca tiʼn hóksah tu píx. Ca tún tiʼn wilaheʼ u chun le tádz maʼscaboʼ mentaan yétel oro, hach sén maʼalob betaabicoʼ, le xan u tadz maʼscabiloʼ mentaan yétel hach maʼalob ácero.
4.10: Le Pixanoʼ ca tu yaʼalah ten ca in quíns Laban; baʼaleʼ ca tiʼn tucultah tiʼn pucsiʼkaleʼ: Mix huntén in wec u kiʼikel maʼc. Ca hoʼopʼ in quiʼquiʼlanquiʼleʼ maʼ tiʼn wóltah in quínsiquiʼ.
4.11: Catu caʼa tʼanaheʼn le Pixanoʼ ca tu yaʼalah ten: Heʼel túnaʼ Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u kubic ta kab. Teneʼ in woheʼl xan, yáxeʼ letiʼ tu yóltah u quínsen, yételeʼ maʼ u kát caʼach u yuʼub u tʼan Yumtsiliʼ; yételeʼ dzoʼoc xan u chʼaʼic c ayikaliloʼob.
4.12: Ca tu caʼa aʼalah ten le Pixanoʼ: Quínseʼ tumen Yumtsil dzoʼoc u kubic ta kab.
4.13: Heʼel túnaʼ Yumtsileʼ cu xuʼulsic kakas maʼcoʼob tu yoʼolal u dzoʼocsaʼal baʼaxoʼob hach tohtac u tuculmaʼh. Mas maʼalob ca químil chén huntúl maʼc mu láh kascuntiʼc tulácal u maʼquiʼloʼob humpʼél cah yétel ca xuʼulsaʼacoʼob bey maʼ yoheʼloʼob le hahiloʼ.
4.14: Le tún ca tiʼn wuʼuyah lelaʼ, ten Nefieneʼ, h kaʼah ten le baʼax u yaʼalmaʼh Yumtsil teʼ kaxoʼ, le tʼanoʼob heʼeloʼobaʼ: Wá tumen a palal le bín síhicoʼoboʼ cu betiʼcoʼob in tʼanoʼobeʼ bín anac yaʼab baʼaloʼob tiʼoʼob teʼ luʼum in wáʼalmaʼh bín dzaʼabac tiʼoʼob.
4.15: Beyoʼ, ca tiʼn tuclah xaneʼ maʼ bín páhchac u betiʼcoʼob u tʼan Yumtsil heʼebix aʼalaʼan tu leyil Moiseseʼ wá minaʼan tiʼoʼob le dzíbtaan leyoʼ.
4.16: In woheʼl xaneʼ le leyoʼ tiʼ yan dzíbtaan tu yókol le laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceoʼ.
4.17: Ulak baʼax xaneʼ tiʼn naʼatah Yumtsil dzoʼoc u kubic Laman tiʼn kab tu yoʼolal u páhtal u yantal ten le dzíbtaan tsicbaloʼ, heʼebix u yaʼalmaʼhileʼ.
4.18: Le betiʼc túneʼ tu yoʼolal in wuʼuyic u tʼan le Pixanoʼ ca tiʼn chʼah Laman tu tsoʼotsel u poleʼ, ca tiʼn lah chʼacah u cal yétel u tadz maʼscabil.
4.19: Cu dzoʼocol in chʼacah u pól yétel u maʼscabileʼ, ca tiʼn búquiʼntiʼnba yétel u nokil Laban, cu dzoʼocol in búquiʼntiʼc tulácaleʼ ca tiʼn dzah tiʼn wókol u yétel armaʼdurail.
4.20: Le cah dzoʼoc in betiʼc tulácal lelaʼ cah binen teʼ cúchil tuʼux cu taaquiʼc u tesoro Laban. Le cah nádzeneʼ ca tiʼn wilaheʼ tiʼ yan u meyhuloʼob maʼquiʼl Laban teʼ cúchiloʼ letiʼ calántiʼc u yaveil le tesorooʼ. Ca tún h tʼanaheʼn bey heʼebix u dzuliloʼ, ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ ca talac tiʼn pach ca xiʼicoʼon teʼ cúchil tuʼux yan le tesorooʼ.
4.21: Letiʼeʼ tu tucultaheʼ u dzulilen tumen tu yilah le nok in búquiʼntmaʼhoʼ yétel le tadz maʼscab in kaxmaʼh tiʼn nakoʼ.
4.22: Ca hoʼopʼ u tʼan tiʼn wétel tu yoʼolal le Judioʼoboʼ tumen u yoheʼl Laban, u dzulileʼ, tiʼ yan yételoʼob ich el ákaboʼ.
4.23: Cah tʼanaheʼn yételeʼ tán in betiʼc beyen Labaneʼ.
4.24: Ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ xaneʼ kabét ca in bis tiʼ in sucuʼunoʼob yanoʼob teʼ tu pach u caʼanal pakil le noh cahoʼ, tulácal le baʼax dzíbtaanoʼob yókol le laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceoʼ.
4.25: Tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ xan ca talac tiʼn pach.
4.26: Letiʼeʼ hach tu tuclaheʼ tán in tʼan tu yoʼolal sucuʼunoʼob teʼ iglesiaoʼ, yétel hach tu tuclah tu hahil teneʼ Labanen, le maʼx maʼ sám in quínseʼ, cah tal tiʼn pach.
4.27: Yaʼab u ténel h tʼanah tiʼn wétel tu yoʼolal u ancianoiloʼob le Judioʼoboʼ, caʼaliquiʼleʼ teneʼ tán caʼach in bin xímbalil tu tohil tuʼux yan in sucuʼunoʼob tu pachil u caʼanal pakil le cahoʼ.
4.28: Le tún ca tu yilaheʼn Lamaneʼ haʼak yól, beyxann Lemuel yétel Sam; cah hók yálcaboʼob tiʼn tán tumen tu tuclahoʼobeʼ Labanen yételwá dzoʼoc u quínsiqueneʼ tán u tal quínsicoʼob xan letiʼoʼob.
4.29: Ca tun tiʼn tʼanahoʼob, le ca tu yuʼubahoʼob in tʼaneʼ cah xuʼul u yálcaboʼob tiʼn tán.
4.30: Le tún u meyhuloʼob Laban ca tu yilah in sucuʼunoʼoboʼ cah hoʼopʼ u quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl yétel hach taitac u yálcab tu cahal Jerusalen.
4.31: Ten Nefieneʼ caʼanal in baquel yétel tumen tiʼn sén kamaʼh muk tiʼ Yumtsileʼ ca tiʼn chʼah u esclavoiʼl Labaneʼ maʼ tiʼn chaʼah u púdzuliʼ.
4.32: Ca tún tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼeʼ wá tumen u yuʼub in tʼaneʼ teneʼ quiʼn wáʼalic tiʼ tu yoʼolal Yumtsil yétel tu yoʼolal in cuxtaleʼ maʼ bin c quínsiquiʼ.
4.33: Ca tiʼn tʼanah in hach hah tʼan tiʼeʼ, ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼeʼ maʼ u chʼaʼic sahaquiʼl; wá letiʼ cu tal t pach teʼ kaxoʼ bin pʼátac beyoʼoneʼ maʼ esclavoiʼ.
4.34: Tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ xaneʼ: Tu hahileʼ Yumtsil u yaʼalmaʼh toʼon ca c bet beyaʼ, maʼ wá u deber c dzaic c ól utiaʼal c betiʼc u tʼan Yumtsiliʼ? Le betiʼc túneʼ wá a kát bin ich kax yétel in tataoʼ yan cúchil atiaʼal ichiloʼon.
4.35: Zoram túneʼ, bey u kabaʼ le maʼc esclavooʼ, hach sén tiʼn dzah ól tiʼ hach tu dzah u yól u betiʼqueʼ ca tu yuʼubah baʼax tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ, ca tu yaʼalah tu hahileʼ heʼel u bin ich kax tuʼux yan in tataoʼ. Ca tu yaʼalah u hahil tʼan tiʼ toʼoneʼ heʼel u pʼátal ichiloʼoneʼ.
4.36: Toʼoneʼ c kát ca pʼátac ichiloʼon tumen beyaʼ le Judioʼoboʼ maʼ tu páhtal u yoheltiʼcoʼob bix púdzicoʼon ich kax yétel xaneʼ, beyoʼ maʼ tu páhtal chʼaʼapachtiʼcoʼonoʼb ca u quínsoʼonoʼob.
4.37: Le tún cah dzoʼoc u yaʼalic toʼon u hahil tʼan Zorameʼ cah háw c sahquiʼl tu yoʼolal letiʼ.
4.38: Ca tún h binoʼon ich kax yétel le laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceoʼ beyxann Zoram u meyah maʼquiʼl Laban, cah binoʼon tu nahil in tata le mentaan yétel nokoʼ.

5.1: Cu dzoʼocol tún c xímbal ich kax tac teʼ tuʼux yan c tataoʼ, heʼel túnaʼ hach quiʼmaʼcchah u yól beyxann in maʼmaʼ Sariah h quiʼmaʼcchah u yól tumen hach tu hahileʼ dzoʼoc u sén okol t oʼolal.
5.2: Tumen tu tuclaheʼ h químoʼon teʼ kaxoʼ yétel dzoʼoc xan u sén taquiʼc u pól in tata tán u yaʼalic tiʼ de que chén cu yilic baʼal ích u tuculoʼob tán u yaʼalic tiʼ: Tech ta hóksoʼon teʼ t luʼum dzaʼan toʼon tumen c tataoʼoboʼ yételeʼ behlaʼeʼ minaʼan in palal, toʼon xaneʼ ich kax bín químicoʼonoʼ.
5.3: Bey tún úchic in maʼmaʼ u taquiʼc u pól in tataoʼ.
5.4: In tataeʼ tu núcah tiʼ tán u yaʼalic: In woheʼl huntúlen maʼc cu yilic visionoʼob, tumen wá maʼ úchic in wilic u baʼaliloʼob Hahal Dios tiʼ humpʼél visioneʼ, behlaʼ maʼ tán caʼach in kahóltiʼc u yutsil Yumtsileʼ, yétel dzoʼoc xan caʼach in pʼátal Jerusalen yétel in sucuʼunoʼob ca químiquen yételoʼob teʼeloʼ.
5.5: Baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ dzoʼoc u dzaʼabal ten humpʼél luʼum prometertaan ten, yételeʼ cu quiʼmaʼcchahac in wól tiʼ le baʼaloʼobaʼ; beyoʼ, teneʼ in woheʼl Yumtsileʼ bín u canánt in palal tu kab Laban ca u bet u sutoʼob tiʼcnal wáy h kaxaʼ.
5.6: Yétel tún le tʼanoʼobaʼ, in tata Lehieʼ tu quiʼmaʼccunsah u yól in maʼmaʼ t oʼolal caʼaliquiʼl tán c bin ich kax tac Jerusalen tu yoʼolal ca c chʼaʼ le u dzíbtaan tsicbaIil le Judioʼoboʼ.
5.7: Le tún cah sunahoʼon teʼ tu nahil in tata le mentaan yétel nokoʼ, hach quiʼmaʼcchah u yóloʼob, beyxann in maʼmaʼ quiʼmaʼcchah u yól.
5.8: Ca tún h tʼanah in maʼmaʼ tán u yaʼalic: Behlaʼ hach in woheʼl Yumtsil u yaʼalmaʼh tiʼ in wícham ca hókoc wáy h kaxaʼ, beyoʼ, hach in woheʼl xaneʼ dzoʼoc u canántiʼc in palal, dzoʼoc u luʼsicoʼob tu kab Laban yétel dzoʼoc u dzaic páhtalil tiʼoʼob ca u betoʼob baʼax h aʼalaʼab tiʼoʼob. Bey úchic u tʼan in Mamaʼoʼ.
5.9: Tu yoʼolal u hach quiʼmaʼquiʼl u yóloʼobeʼ ca tu betahoʼob sacrificio tiʼ Yumtsil tán u dzaicoʼob diosboʼotiʼc tiʼ u Hahal Diosil Israel.
5.10: Cu dzoʼocol u dzaicoʼob diosboʼotiʼc tiʼ u Hahal Diosil Israeleʼ in tata Lehieʼ ca tu chʼaʼah le tsicbaloʼoboʼ le dzíbtaan teʼ laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceoʼ ca tu xocah desde u cáhal.
5.11: Ca tún tu yilah tiʼ yan le u cinco libroiloʼob Moisesoʼ, leloʼobaʼ cu tsolicoʼob bix mentaabic yókolcab, beyxann u cuxtaliʼl Adan yétel Eva, c yáx tataoʼob.
5.12: Beyxan tsicbalil bix cuxlahic le Judioʼoboʼ cáhiʼc hach tu yáx parteil tac tu cáhal u betiʼc u nohchilil Zedequiʼas u reyil Juda.
5.13: Beyxan u tʼaniloʼob le hahil profetaoʼoboʼ, tu yáx chun tac u cáhal u nohchilil Zedequiʼas yétel yaʼab tiʼ u tʼaniloʼob le profeta Jeremiasoʼ.
5.14: Tu yókol xan le laminaoʼob mentaan yétel bronceaʼ, in tataeʼ tu yilah u tsoʼolol u síhil u palal u úchben tataoʼob tu yoʼolaleʼ tu yoheltaheʼ tu familiail Jose u tal, beyoʼ, Joseeʼ u pal Jacob, le maʼx h coʼon ich Egiptoeʼ, letiʼ le maʼx canántaan tumen u kab Yumtsil tu yoʼolal u páhtal u tséntiʼc u tata, Jacob, yétel tulácal u nahil.
5.15: H luʼsaʼaboʼob xan tu esclavoiʼloʼob yétel hóksaʼoʼob ich Egipto tumen Hahal Dios le maʼx canántiʼcoʼob.
5.16: Bey úchic u caxtiʼc Lehi, in tata, u tsoʼolol u familiail u palal u úchben tataoʼob. Laban xaneʼ tiʼ u palal u palaloʼob Jose u tal caʼachiʼ, tu yoʼolal túneʼ letiʼ yétel u tataoʼobeʼ u taacmaʼhoʼob caʼach le dzíbtaan tsicbaloʼ.
5.17: In tata tún le ca tu yilah tulácal le baʼaloʼobaʼ, h chuʼup yétel le Pixanoʼ ca hoʼopʼ u yaʼalic le baʼax bín úchuc tu palal cu síhil tiʼ u palal letiʼ.
5.18: Tán u yaʼaliqueʼ le laminaoʼoboʼ le mentaan yétel bronceoʼ bin xiʼic tiʼ tulácal; cahoʼob, maʼcoʼob, tʼanoʼob yétel meheʼn cahal tiʼ u palal u palaloʼob letiʼ.
5.19: Le betiʼc túneʼ tu yaʼalaheʼ le laminaoʼoboʼ maʼ bín xuʼuluc mix bikiniʼ mix bín páhchahac u luksaʼal u lémbalil tu yoʼolal u maʼn yaʼab kin. Ca tún tu yaʼalah hach hah yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tu yoʼolal u palal u palaloʼob.
5.20: Tac tiʼ le kinoʼob heʼeloʼobaʼ in tata yétel teneʼ c betmaʼh u tʼan Yumtsil u dzamaʼh toʼonoʼ.
5.21: Dzoʼoc tún c chʼaʼic le úchben tsicbal tu yaʼalah toʼon Yumtsiloʼ ca t sén xocah tu beleʼ ca t ilaheʼ hach kabét toʼon, beyoʼ hach coʼocoʼoh baʼal c tiaʼal toʼon tumen beyoʼ heʼel u páhtal c taaquiʼc u tʼanoʼob Yumtsil utiaʼal c palaloʼobeʼ.
5.22: Le betiʼc túneʼ tu naʼatiʼl Hahal Dioseʼ t bisah t étel caʼaliquiʼl tán c bin ich kax tac tiʼ le luʼum prometertaan toʼonoʼ.

6.1: Maʼalob tún Nefieneʼ, maʼ tán in dzíbtiʼc u tsoʼolol u úchben tatailoʼob in tataoʼob tiʼ le baʼaxoʼob quiʼn dzíbtiʼcaʼ; mixbikin xan in dzíbt le heʼeloʼ yókol le laminaoʼob quiʼn dzíbtiʼcaʼ, tumen dzíbtaan tiʼ le baʼaxoʼob u líksmaʼh in tataoʼ, le betiʼqueʼ maʼ tán in dzíbtiʼc tiʼ le quiʼn dzíbtiʼc tenaʼ.
6.2: Chén baʼax quen in wáʼaleʼ tiʼ u palaloʼob Jose in tal.
6.3: Quin tucliqueʼ maʼ hach kabét ca in dzainba in tsicbat tulácal baʼaloʼob tu yoʼolal in tataiʼ tumen maʼ tán u páhtal u dzíbtaal yókol le laminaoʼobaʼ tumen kabét ten le laminaoʼobaʼ utiaʼal in dzíbtiʼc le baʼaxoʼob u kát Hahal Diosoʼ.
6.4: Tumen quiʼn dzíboltiʼqueʼ utiaʼal in betiʼc u kexic u tucul maʼcoʼob ca talacoʼob tu yicnal u Hahal Dios Abraham, Isaac yétel Jacob ca kamicoʼob u cuxtaliʼl yétel Letiʼ.
6.5: Tu yoʼolal túneʼ maʼ tán in dzíbtiʼc baʼaxoʼob uts tu tán yókolcab sino le baʼaxoʼob uts tu tán Hahal Diosoʼ yétel le maʼxoʼob maʼ yokolcabiloʼoboʼ.
6.6: Bey túnoʼ yan in wáʼalic tiʼ in palal bín síhicoʼoboʼ maʼ ca u dzíbtoʼob heʼebaʼax yókol le laminaoʼobaʼ hach chén le baʼaxoʼob hach utstac utiaʼal u palal maʼcoʼoboʼ.

7.1: Behlaʼ túneʼ in kát in wáʼal teʼexeʼ, in tata Lehi le cah dzoʼoc u yaʼalic le baʼax bín úchuc tu palal u palaleʼ, cah caʼa tʼan tumen Yumtsil, tán u yaʼalaʼal tiʼeʼ maʼ u deber u bisic u yét lákiloʼob teʼ le kaxoʼ; baʼaleʼ u xíbil palaleʼ u deber ca dzoʼococ u beloʼob tu yoʼolal u páhtal u yantal u paialoʼob utiaʼal Yumtsil teʼ luʼum aʼalaʼan u dzaʼabal tiʼoʼoboʼ.
7.2: Ca tún h aʼalaʼab tiʼeʼ ca u bet c sut, ten yétel in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ, tu luʼumil Jerusaleneʼ tu yoʼolal c bisic Ismaʼel yétel u lákiloʼob tiʼ le kaxoʼ.
7.3: Ten Nefi, yétel in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca anchah c xímbal tu caʼatén teʼ kaxoʼ tu yoʼolal c caʼa sut Jerusalen.
7.4: Le cah kuchoʼon tiʼcnal Ismaʼeleʼ, heʼel túnaʼ tu kamaʼhoʼon yétel nohoch quiʼmaʼc ólal, tu yoʼolaleʼ h páhchah c tsolic tiʼ u tʼan Yumtsil.
7.5: Yumtsil túneʼ tu betah u yutstal tu xiquiʼn Ismaʼel yétel tulácal le maʼxoʼob yan tu yotochoʼ; tu yoʼolaleʼ h taloʼob t étel teʼ kaxoʼ tac tuʼux yan u yotoch c tataoʼ.
7.6: Caʼaliquiʼl tún tán c bin teʼ kaxoʼ, heʼel túnaʼ Laman, Lemuel, caʼatúl u xchʼupul palal yétel caʼatúl u xíbil palal Ismaʼel yétel u familiaoʼobeʼ maʼ tu yuʼuboʼob c tʼan, tiʼ ten Nefien, tiʼ Sam, tiʼ Ismaʼel, u yatan yétel ulak u xchʼupul palal letiʼ.
7.7: Ichil tún u baʼateloʼobeʼ tán u yaʼalic u sutoʼob tu luʼumil Jerusalen.
7.8: Ten, Nefieneʼ hach yahchah tiʼn wól yoʼolal maʼ tu yuʼuboʼob le maʼalob tʼanoʼ cah tʼanaheʼn yétel Laman beyxann Lemuel tan in wáʼalic tiʼoʼob: Heʼel túnaʼ, teʼexeʼ in sucuʼuneʼex. Baʼaxtén hach chictac a pucsiʼkaleʼex yétel hach chʼoptac a naʼateʼex, ten a wídzineneʼexeʼ kabét ca in wáʼal teʼex yétel ca in weʼes teʼex bix u deber a betiʼc baʼaloʼob?
7.9: Bix maʼ anac a wuʼuyiqueʼex u tʼan Yumtsiliʼ?
7.10: Bix úchic u tuʼubul teʼex ta wilaheʼex huntúl u angel Yumtsil?
7.11: Beyoʼ, yételeʼ bix úchic u tuʼubul teʼex le nucuch baʼaloʼob u betmaʼh Yumtsil? Tiʼ toʼonoʼ, tu calántoʼon tu kab Labaneʼ ca tu chaʼah c chʼaʼic le baʼaxoʼob dzíbtaanoʼ.
7.12: Beyoʼ, bix úchic u tuʼubul teʼex yan páhtalil tiʼ Yumtsil u betiʼc tulácal baʼaloʼob utiaʼal u palal maʼcoʼob heʼebix u kátoʼob wá yan fe tiʼoʼob tiʼ Yumtsil? Bey túnoʼ coʼox dzic c ól tiʼ letiʼ.
7.13: Tumen wá chucaʼan c ól tiʼ letiʼeʼ bín anac toʼon le luʼum aʼalaʼan u dzaʼabal toʼonoʼ; yétel bín a wohélteʼex maʼ nách kineʼ, bín dzoʼocsaʼac u tʼan Yumtsil tu yoʼolal cun xuʼulsbil Jerusalen; tumen tulácal baʼax u yaʼalmaʼh Yumtsil tu yoʼolal u xuʼululeʼ yan u yúchul.
7.14: Heʼel túnaʼ u Pixan Yumtsileʼ yan u lukul tiʼcnaloʼob sébaʼan tumen maʼ tu yóltahoʼob u kamoʼob le profetaoʼoboʼ yétel tu pulahoʼob Jeremias tiʼ humpʼél calabozo. Dzoʼoc xan u yóltiʼcoʼob u quínsoʼob in tata tu yoʼolaleʼ anchah u púdzul tiʼ le cahoʼ.
7.15: Le betiʼc quiʼn wáʼalic teʼexeʼ wá ca suteʼex Jerusaleneʼ yan xan a químileʼex yételoʼob. Bey túnoʼ, wá a káteʼexeʼ suneneʼex teʼ cahoʼ yételeʼ kaʼahac teʼex le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc in wáʼalic teʼexoʼ, wá ca bineʼexeʼ yan xan a químileʼex; tumen bey u dzaic ten ca tʼanaquen u Pixan Yumtsil.
7.16: Ten Nefien, le cah dzoʼoc in wáʼalic le tʼanoʼob tiʼ in sucuʼunoʼobaʼ, hach pʼuʼuhoʼob tiʼn woʼolal. Ca tu pulahubaoʼob tiʼn wókol tumen hach pʼuʼuhoʼob, ca tu yóltahoʼob u quínsenoʼob, ca tu kaxtenoʼob yétel sumoʼobeʼ beyoʼ bín u pʼatenoʼob ich kaxoʼ tu yoʼolal u páhtal in hantaal tumen baʼalcheʼoʼob.
7.17: Chén baʼaleʼ ca tún tiʼn kátah tiʼ Yumtsil tán in wáʼalic: In Yumtsil heʼebix yaniʼl in fe tiʼ techeʼ, salvarteʼn tu kab in sucuʼunoʼob; beyoʼ, dza ten muk tu yoʼolal u páhtal in tʼoquiʼc le sumoʼob kaxmaʼhilenaʼ.
7.18: Le tún cah dzoʼoc in wáʼalic le tʼanoʼobaʼ le sumoʼob kaxmaʼhil in kabeʼ wáchʼlaʼahoʼob beyxann in woc, ca tún wáʼalaheʼn tu tán in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca tiʼn caʼa tʼanahoʼob.
7.19: Ca tún h pʼuʼuhoʼob tiʼn woʼolal tu caʼaténeʼ ca tu yóltahoʼob u maʼchénoʼob; baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ, huntúl tiʼ u xchʼupul palal Ismaʼeleʼ, beyoʼ beyxann u maʼmaʼ yétel huntúl tiʼ u xíbil palal Ismaʼeleʼ h tʼanahoʼob yételin sucuʼunoʼob tiʼn woʼolal, le betiʼc túneʼ maʼ chich u pucsiʼkaloʼobeʼ ca tu pʼatoʼob u yaʼalic u quínsiquenoʼob.
7.20: Ca tún anchah u sén yahtal u yóloʼob tu yoʼolal u kebanoʼobeʼ ca tu chin u póloʼob tiʼn tán utiaʼal u sén kátiʼcoʼob ten ca in perdonart tiʼoʼob le baʼaxoʼob dzoʼoc u mentiʼcoʼob tenoʼ.
7.21: Ca tún tiʼn perdonart tiʼoʼob yétel quiʼmaʼc ólal tulácal baʼaxoʼob u mentmaʼhoʼob teneʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼob ca u kátoʼob perdon tiʼ Yumtsil Hahal Dios xan. Ca tún anchah u betiʼcoʼob beyoʼ. Cu dzoʼocol u oraroʼob tiʼ Yumtsileʼ, ca hoʼopʼ c bin tu caʼatén teʼ tuʼux yan u yotoch c tata le mentaan yétel nokoʼ.
7.22: Ca tún anchah c kuchul tu yotoch c tata; le cah kuchoʼon, ten yétel in sucuʼunoʼob, yétel tulácal u familia Ismaʼel teʼ tu yotoch in tataoʼ, letiʼoʼobeʼ tu dzahoʼob gracias tiʼ Yumtsil Hahal Dios; yétel tu tocahoʼob baʼalcheʼoʼob tu yoʼolal u dzaicoʼob sacrificio tiʼ Hahal Dios.

16.1: Le ca tún h dzoʼoc in tʼan yétel in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ, ten Nefieneʼ, ca tu yaʼalahoʼob ten: Techeʼ ta wáʼalah toʼon baʼaloʼob hach talamtac, hach chictac maʼs tiʼ le cu páhtal c kamicoʼ.
16.2: Ca tiʼn núcah tiʼoʼobeʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah: In woheʼleʼ tiʼn wáʼalah tʼanoʼob hach chichtacoʼob tu yoʼolal le kakas maʼcoʼoboʼ, heʼebix u hahileʼ, yétel dzoʼoc in dzaic muk tiʼ le toh u cuxtaloʼoboʼ, yétel in wáʼalmaʼheʼ le heʼeloʼobaʼ bin líkiʼcoʼob tu dzoʼoc kin, tu yoʼolal leloʼ le maʼ toh u cuxtaloʼoboʼ, haheʼ hach chich u yilicoʼob le hahiloʼ tumen cu xoʼotʼoloʼob tac hach tu dzuʼoʼob.
16.3: Le betiʼc túneʼ in sucuʼuneʼex wá teʼex toh a cuxtaleʼexeʼ, yétel ca a dzíbolteʼex a wuʼuyeʼex le hahiloʼ yétel ca a beteʼexeʼ tu yoʼolal ca xímbalnaqueʼex toh tu tán Hahal Dioseʼ behlaʼ maʼ tán a wáʼalic baʼal tu yoʼolal le hahoʼ tán a wáʼaliqueʼexeʼ tán in wáʼalic chich baʼaloʼob ta woʼolaleʼex.
16.4: Teʼ tún Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah hach tu bel tiʼn sucuʼunoʼob ca u betoʼob u tʼan Yumtsil.
16.5: Ca tún tu humillartubaoʼob tu tán Yumtsil, hach bey tu betoʼoboʼ cah hach quiʼmaʼcchah in wól tu yoʼolaloʼob ca xímbalnacoʼob tiʼ u toh behil le justiʼciaoʼ.
16.6: Tulácal le baʼaloʼobaʼ h aʼalaʼaboʼ yétel h mentaab caʼaliquiʼl cahaʼan in tata tu yotoch le mentaan yétel nokoʼ teʼ luʼum tuʼux tu dzah u kabaʼ u luʼumil Lemuel.
16.7: Ten tún Nefieneʼ ca tún h dzoʼoc in bel yételhuntúl u xchʼupal Ismaʼel; in sucuʼunoʼob xaneʼ cah dzoʼoc u beloʼob yétel ulak u xchʼupaloʼob Ismaʼel; Zorameʼ h dzoʼoc u bel yételu maʼs chʼíhaʼan u xchʼupal Ismaʼel.
16.8: Bey tún úchuc u betiʼc in tata tulácal le tʼanoʼob h dzaʼab tiʼ tumen Yumtsileʼ ten tún Nefieneʼ hach sén bendecirtaaben tumen Yumtsil.
16.9: Tu yákabileʼ cah tʼaʼan in tata tumen Yumtsil, tán u yaʼalaʼal tiʼeʼ ca hoʼopʼoʼc u bin tu caʼatén sámaʼl ich kaxoʼ.
16.10: Leca tún h lík in tata cah hók teʼ ichil u nahil le mentaan yétel nokoʼ cah sáschah tulak kinoʼ, hach sén haʼak u yól le tu yilah humpʼél baʼal wolis hach sén heʼlaʼan; le heʼeloʼ h betaab yétel bronce. Tiʼ le baʼal wolisoʼ yan caʼadzít baʼaxoʼob tiʼ, le hundzítoʼ cu túchʼubtiʼc le behoʼ.
16.11: Ca tún t molah tulácal baʼaxoʼob yan c bisic teʼ kaxoʼ yétel u yalab baʼal c hánt u dzamaʼh toʼon Yumtsil ca t múchʼquiʼntah tulácal u heʼheʼlásil nekoʼob utiaʼal c bis teʼ kaxoʼ.
16.12: Ca tún t cuchah c otoch le mentaan yétel nokoʼ cah hókoʼon teʼ kaxoʼ tán maʼn tulak tsel u rioil Laman.
16.13: Ichil cuatro kinoʼob tán u bin c xímbal tiʼ nohol lakineʼ ca tún t wédzcuntah c otoch le mentaan yétel nokoʼ tu caʼaténeʼ ca t dzah u kabaʼil le cúchiloʼ Xázer.
16.14: Caʼaliquiʼl tún teʼ yanoʼon teʼ kaxoʼ ca t chʼaʼah c arcoʼob yétel flechas cah hókoʼon c caxtiʼc wábaʼax c dzoneʼ utiaʼal u hant c ét lákiloʼob. Cu dzoʼocol c dzoneʼ cah sunahoʼon t otoch teʼ kaxoʼ tuʼux yan le cúchil cu kabaʼtiʼc Xázeroʼ. Ca tún hoʼopʼ c bin tu caʼatén teʼ kaxoʼ. Tán u bin c bin lailiʼ tu tohil tuʼux c bin caʼacheʼ tán c maʼn tiʼ tuʼuxoʼob hach maʼalobtac u luʼumil utiaʼal pakal teʼ kaxoʼ lailiʼ nadz tiʼ le Mar Rojooʼ.
16.15: Ca tún anchah u bin c xímbal ichil yaʼabach kinoʼob, tán c dzonic baʼaxoʼob cu kabétchahal toʼon teʼ behoʼ utiaʼal c hanteʼ, tán c dzonic yétel c arcoʼoboʼ yétel c flechas yétel c dzon yétel c tunichoʼob.
16.16: Toʼoneʼ tán c bin heʼebix yaʼalic toʼon le baʼax wolisoʼ cu yeʼesic toʼon le behoʼ tiʼ le tuʼuxoʼob hach maʼalobtac utiaʼal pakal teʼ kaxoʼ.
16.17: Cu dzoʼocol c xímbal yaʼabach kinoʼobeʼ ca t wédzcuntah c otochoʼob mentaan yétel nokoʼ chén utiaʼal humpʼít kinoʼob ca c chan heʼesicba yétel utiaʼal u yantal baʼal c hant yétel c ét lákiloʼob.
16.18: Ten tún Nefieneʼ le cah hóken utiaʼal in bin dzoneʼ, cah paʼakah in arco le mentaan yétel ácero, heʼel túnaʼ in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ cah kuxilnahoʼob tiʼ ten tu yoʼolal úchic in kascuntiʼc in arco beyoʼ tumen maʼ t caxtah baʼal c hantiʼ.
16.19: Ca tún h sunahoʼoneʼ mixbaʼal yan hantbil utiaʼal c ét lákiloʼob, cu dzoʼocoleʼ letiʼoʼobeʼ hach caʼanaʼanoʼob tu yoʼolal c sén xímbaleʼ, hach sén yahchahoʼob tumen minaʼan mixbaʼal c hanteʼ.
16.20: Ca tún anchah u hoʼopʼoʼl sén yaʼalic baʼal Laman yétel Lemuel bey heʼebix xan u palal Ismaʼeloʼ tu yoʼolal u sén yahtaloʼob yétel u yayah ólaloʼob teʼ kaxoʼ, tac in tata hoʼopʼ u yaʼalic baʼal tu contra Yumtsil u Hahal Dios, beyoʼ tu yoʼolal hach sén yaʼab u yayah ólaloʼobeʼ ca hoʼopʼ u sén yaʼalic baʼal tu contra Hahal Dios.
16.21: Ten tún Nefieneʼ yahchah in wól tu yoʼolal u tʼan in sucuʼunoʼob tu yoʼolal paʼakahaʼan in arco, tumen u arcoʼoboʼoʼob letiʼoʼobeʼ maʼ tu dzonoʼob maʼalobiʼ tu yoʼolal minaʼan u mukeʼ, beyoʼ hach istiʼcyah tiʼ toʼon ca tún h pʼateʼ maʼ páhchah c caxtiʼc baʼal c hantiʼ.
16.22: Ten Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn sén tʼanaheʼn tiʼn sucuʼunoʼob, tumen dzoʼoc caʼach u chichtal u pucsiʼkaloʼob tu caʼatén tán tac u yaʼalic baʼal tu contra Yumtsil u Hahal Diosoʼob.
16.23: Ten tún Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn betah humpʼél arco yétel cheʼ beyxann humpʼél toh bekech cheʼ utiaʼal flecha, tiʼn yétel betah humpʼél dzonil nokoʼ yétel tiʼn molah chan tunichoʼob utiaʼal dzonbil. Cu dzoʼocoleʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ in tata: Tuʼux u deber in bin ca páhchahac in caxtiʼc baʼal c hanteʼ?
16.24: In tata túneʼ ca tu kátah tiʼ Yumtsil tumen tu humillartubaoʼob tu yoʼolal le baʼax tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼoboʼ; tumen tiʼn wáʼalah yaʼabach baʼal tiʼoʼob yétel tulácal yól in pucsiʼkal.
16.25: Ca tún h tʼaʼan in tata tumen Yumtsil, tu hahileʼ h keʼey tu yoʼolal úchic u yaʼalic baʼal tu contra Yumtsil, tu yoʼolal úchic u kéyeloʼ ca sén yayah ólchahiʼ.
16.26: Ca tún h aʼalaʼab tiʼ tumen Yumtsil: Il a wil le wolis baʼaloʼ ca a xoc le baʼaxoʼob dzíbtaanoʼ.
16.27: Le ca tún h dzoʼoc yilic in tata baʼaxoʼob dzíbtaan yókol le baʼax wolisoʼ h sahacchaheʼ ca hoʼopʼ u sén quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl, beyxann in sucuʼunoʼob yétel u palal Ismaʼel beyxann c atanoʼob.
16.28: Ten tún Nefieneʼ tiʼn wilaheʼ le baʼaxoʼob cu túchʼubtiʼcoʼ le yanoʼob teʼ baʼal wolisoʼ tán u yeʼesic toʼon le behoʼ hach heʼebix c mentiʼlac le baʼax cu yaʼalic toʼonoʼ yétel xan le fe c dzic tiʼoʼ.
16.29: Yókol xaneʼ tiʼ yan humpʼél túmben dzíbiʼ, le dzíbaʼ maʼ istiʼcyah u xoʼocoliʼ, letiʼ cu dzaic c ohélt u beloʼob Yumtsil cu dzíbtaaleʼ cu kexpahal u dzíbil ich hun sútuquiʼl, heʼebix le c fe tiʼoʼ yétel heʼebix c dzicba c ment le baʼax cu yaʼalicoʼ bey túnoʼ c iliqueʼ tiʼ baʼaloʼob meheʼntaqueʼ, Yumtsil cu páhtal u betiʼc nucuch baʼaloʼob.
16.30: Ten Nefien, túneʼ, h naʼaquen tac tu hach caʼanalil le caʼanal luʼumoʼ heʼebix tu yeʼesahil le baʼax wolisoʼ.
16.31: Ca tún tiʼn quínsah baʼalcheʼoʼobeʼ cah anchah baʼal u hant c ét lákiloʼob.
16.32: Ca tún h sunaheʼn tiʼ t otochoʼob le mentaan yétel nokoʼ in cuchmaʼh le baʼalcheʼoʼob tiʼn quínsahoʼoboʼ le ca tún tu yilahoʼob tiʼn tasah baʼal hantbileʼ, hach sén quiʼmaʼc yóloʼob ca tu humillartubaoʼob tu tán Yumtsileʼ, yétel ca tu dzahoʼob diosboʼotiʼc tiʼ.
16.33: Cu dzoʼocol tún leloʼ ca hoʼopʼ c bin tu caʼatén tu tohil tuʼux h binoʼon caʼachoʼ. Cu dzoʼocol c xímbal yaʼabach kinoʼobeʼ ca t wédzcuntah c otochoʼob tu caʼatén tu yoʼolal c pʼátal dzeʼedzec kin teʼeloʼ.
16.34: Ca tún h quím Ismaʼeleʼ cah muʼuc tiʼ humpʼél cúchil cu kabaʼtiʼc Nahom.
16.35: U palal Ismaʼeleʼ sén okolnahoʼob yoʼolal u tataoʼob tán xan u sén yahtal u yóloʼob tu yoʼolal hach istiʼcyah ca hoʼopʼ u yaʼalic baʼal tu contra in tata tumen letiʼ hóksoʼob tu luʼumil Jerusalen, tán u yaʼalicoʼob: C tataeʼ dzoʼoc u químil, beyoʼ, toʼoneʼ dzoʼoc c maʼn yaʼab tuʼux ich kax tán c uʼuyic ukahoʼon, wiʼihoʼon yétel sénquech caʼanaʼanoʼoneʼ; cu dzoʼocol le nucuch yayah ólal yan toʼonaʼ wáy bín químicoʼonaʼ sén wiʼihoʼon ich kaxaʼ.
16.36: Beyoʼ tu yaʼalah baʼal tu contra in tata, beyxann tiʼ ten, hach tac u sutoʼob Jerusalen.
16.37: Ca tún tu yaʼalah Laman tiʼ Lemuel yétel tiʼ u palal Ismaʼel: Heʼel túnaʼ coʼoneʼex quínsic c tata yétel c ídzin Nefi tumen hach u kát u betuba nohochil yétel u caʼansicoʼon toʼon u nucuch sucuʼunoʼon.
16.38: Beʼoraaʼ cu yaʼaliqueʼ, Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u tʼan yétel, dzoʼoc xan u kamic u xímbal angeloʼob. Baʼaleʼ toʼoneʼ c oheʼl chén cu tus. Cu yaʼalic toʼon tulácal le baʼaloʼobaʼ yétel cu betiʼc le ulak baʼaloʼob cu tuclicoʼ tu yoʼolal u páhtal u tusicoʼon tán u tucliqueʼ ca páhchahac u bisicoʼon ich kaxaʼ; cu dzoʼocol u bisicoʼoneʼ, cu tucluqueʼ heʼel u betiʼcuba c reyil yétel c nohchil tu yoʼolal u betiʼc toʼon le baʼax cu yóltoʼ. Bey tún úchic u betiʼc in su cuʼun Laman u kuʼuxul u pucsiʼkaloʼoboʼ.
16.39: Ca tún h tal Yumtsil tiʼcnal, beyoʼ h aʼalaʼab yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tiʼoʼob tumen Yumtsil, yétel sén h keʼeyoʼob in sucuʼunoʼob. Cu dzoʼocol tún u keʼeyeloʼob tumen Yumtsileʼ, chan tu pʼatoʼob u kuxiloob ca tu pʼatoʼob u kebanoʼob, le betiʼc túneʼ, Yumtsileʼ tu bendecirtoʼon yétel hanal tu caʼatén tu yoʼolal maʼ químicoʼoniʼ.

17.1: Ca tún hoʼopʼ c bin tu caʼatén ich kax tán c bin lakin desde le kinoʼ cah binoʼon yétel yahchahoʼon yaʼab ich kaxoʼ, c atanoʼobeʼ tu dzahoʼob toʼon palal teʼeloʼ.
17.2: Quex beyoʼ hach nuctac u bendicionoʼob tu wecah Yumtsil t ókoloʼ, quex tumen cuxlahoʼon chén yétel cheʼecheʼ bak teʼ kaxoʼ, c atanoʼobeʼ hach anchah u kab yimoʼob utiaʼal u chuʼuch u meheʼn palaloʼobeʼ ca hach anchah u mukoʼob, beyoʼ le palaloʼoboʼ hach anchah u mukoʼob hach heʼebix u muk xíboʼobeʼ, ca hoʼopʼ u cuchic u cuchoʼob maʼ tu queharoʼobiʼ.
17.3: Bey túnoʼ c iliqueʼ u tʼan Hahal Dioseʼ yan u betaaleʼ, wá u palal maʼc cu betiʼc u tán Hahal Dioseʼ letiʼeʼ cu tséntiʼcoʼob yétel cu dzaic u mukoʼob, cu dzaic xan bix úchic u páhtal u betaal le tʼanoʼob u dzamaʼhoʼ; le betiʼqueʼ Yumtsileʼ tu dzah toʼon baʼax kabét toʼon caʼaliquiʼl tiʼ yanoʼon teʼ kaxoʼ.
17.4: Teʼeloʼ tiʼ cahlahoʼon yaʼabach haʼab, beyoʼ ocho haʼab h pʼátoʼon teʼ kaxoʼ.
17.5: Ca tún h kuchoʼon teʼ luʼum t dzah u kabaʼi Yaʼabil Yan tumen hach sénquech yaʼab u yich u cheʼiloʼob yétel hach yan cah caxtaan ich kaxiʼ; Yumtsil tu listocuntah tulácal lelaʼ tu yoʼolal maʼ c químil. Ca t ilah le kaʼnaboʼ u kabaʼ Irreantum, u kát yaʼaleʼ yaʼab haʼ.
17.6: Teʼ tún tu tsel le kaʼnaboʼ tiʼ t wédzcuntah c otochoʼobiʼ; quex tumen yahchahoʼon yaʼab, beyoʼ, tiʼ hach yaʼab yah ólal anchah toʼon de que maʼ tu páhtal c dzíbtiʼc tulácal, toʼoneʼ quex beyoʼ hach quiʼmaʼcchah c ól le cah kuchoʼon tu tsel le kaʼnaboʼ, ca t dzah u kabaʼ le luʼumoʼ Yaʼab Yanoʼ tumen hach yan yich u cheʼiloʼob.
17.7: Cu dzoʼocol tún in cahtal yaʼabach kinoʼob tiʼ luʼum u kabaʼeʼ Yaʼab Yanoʼ, ca tu tʼanaheʼn Yumtsileʼ, ca tu yaʼalah ten. Líkeneʼ ca naʼacaquech tiʼ yókol le caʼanal luʼumoʼ. Ca tún líkeneʼ ca naʼaquen yókol le caʼanal muloʼ ca kaʼam tʼanen tiʼ Yumtsil.
17.8: Ca tún tu tʼanaheʼn Yumtsileʼ ca tu yaʼalah ten: Yana betiʼc humpʼél barco, ten quiʼn weʼesic tech bixiʼ tu yoʼolal u páhtal in bisic a cahal teʼ ichil le haʼoʼobaʼ.
17.9: Ca tún tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼ Yumtsil: Tuʼux únchac in bin in chʼaʼ le metal kabét ten utiaʼal in betiʼc le heʼrramientoʼoboʼ utiaʼal in betiʼc le barcooʼ le bix dzoʼoc a weʼesic tenoʼ?
17.10: Ca tún tu yaʼalah ten Yumtsil tuʼux u deber in bin ca in caxt le metal utiaʼal in betiʼc le heʼrramientoʼoboʼ.
17.11: Ten tún Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn betah baʼaloʼob tiʼ u kéwel baʼalcheʼ utiaʼal u yustaal kak, cu dzoʼocol in betiʼc le heʼeloʼoboʼ le kabét ten utiaʼal u yustaal le kákoʼ, ca tiʼn koʼokolah caʼapʼél tunichoʼob, humpʼél tu yókol ulak, tu yoʼolal u hókol u kákilo.
17.12: Tumen tac tiʼ le kinoʼoboʼ, Yumtsileʼ maʼ u chaʼ u yantal toʼon yaʼab kák caʼaliquiʼl tán c bin teʼ kaxoʼ, tumen cu yaʼaliqueʼ ten bín in bet u quiʼchahal a woʼocheʼex tu yoʼolal maʼ kabét u preparartaaliʼ.
17.13: Ten xan a sásileʼneʼex teʼ kaxoʼ, yétel bín in weʼes teʼex le beh actán tiʼ teʼex wá ca betiʼqueʼex in tʼanoʼoboʼ. Le betiʼqueʼ wá ca wuʼuyiqueʼex in tʼanoʼobeʼ, bin bisaʼaqueʼex teʼ prometertaan luʼumoʼ yétel bín a wohélteʼexeʼ, ten h biseʼex.
17.14: Beyoʼ, ca tún tu yaʼalah Yumtsil xaneʼ: Le quen kuchuqueʼex teʼ luʼum prometertaanoʼ bín a wohélteʼexeʼ ten, Yumtsileʼ Hahal Diosen yételeʼ ten le Yumtsiloʼ tiʼn calánteʼex teʼex utiaʼal maʼ ta xuʼululeʼexiʼ, beyoʼ, ten xan hókseʼex tu luʼumil Jerusalen.
17.15: Le betiʼc túneʼ ten Nefieneʼ tán caʼach in dziquiʼnba in dzoʼocs u tʼan Yumtsil yételeʼ tán caʼach in tsolic u xiquiʼn in sucuʼunoʼob ca u creertoʼob yétel ca u dzah u yóloʼob.
17.16: Ca tún tiʼn mentah le heʼrramientoʼoboʼ yétel le metal h yiʼib tiʼ le tunichoʼ.
17.17: Le tún ca tu yilah in sucuʼunoʼob hach taitac in mentiʼc humpʼél barcoeʼ, cah hoʼopʼ u yaʼalic baʼal tiʼn woʼolal tán u yaʼalicoʼob: C ídzineʼ dzoʼoc u chocotal u pól; tán u tuclic heʼel u páhtal u mentiʼc humpʼél barcoeʼ, tún xan u tucliqueʼ yétel leloʼ heʼel u páhtal u bin chúmuc de nucuch haʼoʼoboʼ.
17.18: Bey úchic u yaʼalic baʼal in sucuʼunoʼob tiʼn woʼolal, yételeʼ maʼ tu yóltahoʼob meyahiʼ tumen tán u tuclicoʼobeʼ maʼ tán u páhtal in betiʼc humpʼél barcooʼ, mix xan tán u creertiʼcoʼob wá Yumtsil eʼesic ten bix quen in mentiʼl.
17.19: Cu dzoʼocol túneʼ cah anchah u yúchuleʼ, ten Nefieneʼ tiʼn wuʼuyah hach yan ten yayah ólal tu yoʼolal u chichil u pucsiʼkaloʼob; le tún ca tu yilahoʼob tán u yahtal in wóleʼ cah quiʼmaʼcchah yól u pucsiʼkaloʼob tiʼ ten, tán u yaʼalicoʼob: C oheʼleʼ maʼ tu páhtal a mentiʼc humpʼél barcoeʼ, tumen c oheʼleʼ minaʼan a naʼat utiaʼal a betiʼc nucuch meyahoʼobeʼ.
17.20: Techeʼ beyech c tata cu chaʼic u bisaʼal tumen u chan tuculil u pucsiʼkal maʼ tu beliʼ. Beyoʼ, tu hóksoʼon tu luʼumil Jerusalen, dzoʼoc c maʼn tiʼ yaʼab tuʼuxoʼob wáy kaxaʼ, tiʼ tulácal le kinoʼobaʼ c atanoʼobeʼ h meyanahoʼob quex tumen kohaʼanoʼob tiʼ chanpal, dzoʼoc xan u dzaicoʼob toʼon meheʼn palal wáy kaxaʼ tán u yahtal yóloʼob tiʼ tulácal baʼal, baʼaleʼ maʼ h químoʼobiʼ, maʼs maʼalob caʼach ca químicoʼob antes u hókloʼob Jerusaleneʼ tuʼux maʼ u taloʼob u yuʼuboʼob le yahoʼobaʼ.
17.21: Heʼel túnaʼ dzoʼoc u sén yahtal c ól wáy kaxaʼ tiʼ le kinoʼobaʼ; tiʼ tulácal le kinoʼobaʼ dzoʼoc caʼach c quiʼ óltal yétel baʼaxoʼob yan toʼon t cahal tuʼux yan toʼon le baʼaxoʼob tu pʼatah toʼon c ét lákiloʼob antes u químiloʼobeʼ, beyoʼ dzoʼoc caʼach u quiʼmaʼctal c óleʼ.
17.22: C oheʼl xaneʼ le maʼxoʼob yanoʼob caʼach tu luʼumil Jerusalenoʼ toh u cuxtaloʼob tumen cu yuʼubicoʼob u tʼan Yumtsil, heʼebix xan tulácal u tʼanoʼob heʼebix letiʼoʼ. Bey tún úchic u tʼan in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ tán u yaʼalicoʼob baʼal t oʼolal yétel tún taquiʼcoʼob c pól.
17.23: Ca tun anchah u yúchul le heʼelaʼ, ten Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼob beyaʼ: Ca tucliqueʼexeʼ c tataoʼob u palal Israeleʼ, dzoʼoc wá caʼach u salvartiʼcubaoʼob tu kab le egiptoiloʼob wá maʼ úchic u yuʼubicoʼob u tʼan Yumtsileʼ?
17.24: Ca tucultiʼqueʼexeʼ dzoʼoc wá caʼach u páhtal u hókoloʼob tiʼ u esclavoiʼloʼob wá maʼ úchic u túxtaal Moises tumen Yumtsil tu yoʼolal u hóksaʼaloʼobeʼ?
17.25: Teʼexeʼ a woheʼleʼex u palal Israeleʼ bey esclavoʼob yanoʼob caʼachiʼ, ichil yaʼabach meyahoʼob hach istiʼcyah u meyahoʼobeʼ; le betiʼc túneʼ, a woheʼleʼex hach maʼalob ca bisaʼacoʼob nách tiʼ le maʼxoʼob cu meyahtiʼcoʼoboʼ.
17.26: Ulak baʼaxeʼ a woheʼleʼex Moiseseʼ h aʼalaʼab tiʼ tumen Yumtsil ca u bet le nohoch meyahoʼ; chén yétel u tʼaneʼ caʼa hadzpah le Mar Rojo tu yoʼolal u maʼnoʼob xímbalileʼ mix h chʼuʼul u yocoʼobiʼ.
17.27: Baʼaleʼ a woheʼleʼex le egiptoiloʼob u baʼatel maʼcoʼob Faraoneʼ láh búloʼob teʼ Mar Rojooʼ.
17.28: A woheʼleʼex xaneʼ h tséntaaboʼob yétel wáh desde caʼanoʼ le cah anchahoʼob teʼ kaxoʼ.
17.29: Beyoʼ a woheʼleʼex xaneʼ tu yoʼolal u tʼan Moises heʼebix u páhtalil Hahal Dios yan tiʼeʼ tu hadzah le tunichoʼ cah hók haʼ tiʼ tu yoʼolal u ca anac u yantal haʼ utiaʼal le ukahoʼob maʼquiʼloʼob Israel.
17.30: Quex tumen h eʼesaʼab tiʼoʼob le behoʼ tumen Yumtsil u Hahal Diosoʼob yétel le maʼx cu salvartiʼcoʼoboʼ, tánil cu bin tiʼ letiʼoʼob, ich kineʼ tán u yeʼesicoʼob le behoʼ yétel ich ákabeʼ cu dzaic sásil tiʼoʼob tán xan u betiʼc utiaʼaloʼobeʼ tulácal baʼal kabét u kamic maʼc, tu chichcuntah u pucsiʼkaloʼob, tu pixah u tuculoʼobeʼ, ca tu yaʼalahoʼob baʼal tu contra Moiseseʼ yétel tiʼ le hahil Dios cuxaʼanoʼ.
17.31: Ca tún anchah u yúchuleʼ, heʼebix u yaʼalmaʼhileʼ, tu xuʼulsahoʼob, heʼebix xan u yaʼalmaʼhileʼ tu yeʼes tiʼoʼob le behoʼ, beyoʼ heʼebix u yaʼalmaʼhileʼ tu betah tulácal baʼal tu yoʼolaloʼob, mixbaʼal h mentaab wá maʼ bey u yaʼalmaʼhiloʼ.
17.32: Le cah dzoʼoc u maʼnoʼob chúmuc Rio Jordaneʼ, letiʼ tu dzah tiʼoʼob u mukil utiaʼal u hók kiʼitpahoʼob antes u xuʼulsaʼal tiʼoʼob le maʼcoʼob cahaʼanoʼob teʼ luʼum heʼeloʼ, beyoʼ, tu kiʼkiʼtoʼob tac ca xuʼulsaʼacoʼob.
17.33: Behlaʼ, ca tucliqueʼexeʼ le maʼcoʼob cahacbaloʼob teʼ luʼum heʼelaʼ, le maʼxoʼob cahaʼanoʼob tu luʼumil prometertaanoʼ, le maʼxoʼob kiʼkiʼtaaboʼob tumen c úchben tataoʼoboʼ, ca tucliqueʼex wá hach toh u cuxtaloʼobeʼ? Heʼel túnaʼ quiʼn wáʼalic teʼexeʼ maʼ.
17.34: Ca tucliqueʼex wá de que c tataoʼobeʼ maʼs maʼalob que letiʼoʼob wá toh u cuxtaloʼob maʼcoʼob anchahoʼob teʼeloʼ antes tiʼ c tataoʼobeʼ? Quin wáʼalic teʼexeʼ maʼ.
17.35: Heʼel túnaʼ, Yumtsileʼ mixmaʼc heʼlaʼan cu pactiʼc letiʼ, tulácal igual u pactiʼc; le maʼx toh u cuxtaloʼ letiʼ cu yántaal tumen Hahal Dios. Baʼaleʼ ilawileʼexeʼ, le cahaʼ maʼ tu kamaʼh mix humpʼél u tʼan Hahal Diosiʼ, yétel hach dzoʼoc u yaʼabtal u kasiʼl, yétel xan u chuchʼanil u yutsil Hahal Dioseʼ tiʼ yan yókoloʼobeʼ. Yumtsil túneʼ ca tu kascuntah le luʼumaʼ tu contraoʼobeʼ; ca tu bendecirtah utiaʼal c tataoʼob. Beyoʼ tu kascuntah tu contraoʼob tac u xuʼululoʼobeʼ ca tu bendecirtah tu yoʼolal c tataoʼob ca pátac u yantal tiʼoʼob páhtalil yókoleʼ.
17.36: Heʼel túnaʼ, Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u betiʼc luʼum tu yoʼolal u cahtal maʼcoʼob yétel dzoʼoc xan u mentiʼc u palal tu yoʼolal u yantal tiʼoʼob.
17.37: Cu líksic u cahil le maʼxoʼob utsoʼoboʼ yétel cu xuʼulsic u cahil le kakas maʼcoʼoboʼ.
17.38: Cu bisic le toh u cuxtaloʼoboʼ tiʼ sénquech maʼalob luʼumoʼoboʼ yétel cu xuʼulsic le kakas maʼcoʼoboʼ tán u kascuntiʼc le luʼum tu contraoʼoboʼ.
17.39: Cu gobernartiʼc desde le caʼanoʼoboʼ tu tronoeʼ; yételeʼ le yókolcabaʼ u cúchilil tuʼux cu heʼesic u yoc.
17.40: Cu yabiltiʼc xan le maʼxoʼob kamic tiʼ bey u Diosiloʼ. Heʼel túnaʼ letiʼ tu yabiltah c tataoʼob yétel tu betah convenio yételoʼob, beyoʼ yétel Abraham, Isaac yétel Jacob ca tu kaʼahsah xan le promesaoʼob u mentmaʼhoʼ ca tu hóksoʼob tu luʼumil Egipto.
17.41: Ca tu hadzah tiʼoʼob yétel hundzít cheʼ ich kaxoʼ tumen tu chichcuntah u pucsiʼkaloʼob heʼebix dzoʼoc a betiʼqueʼex teʼexoʼ; le betiʼc túneʼ Yumtsileʼ tu hadzah tiʼoʼob tu yoʼolal u kebanoʼob. Ca tún tu túxtah xiknal kákil canoʼob ichiloʼob, le cah chiʼiboʼobeʼ, tu listocunt le behoʼ tu yoʼolal u dzaʼacaloʼob, le baʼax yan u betiʼcoʼoboʼ letiʼ chén ca u pactoʼob; tu yoʼolal tún hach facil le baʼax h dzaʼab tiʼoʼob ca u betoʼoboʼ, yaʼab h químoʼobiʼ.
17.42: Yaʼab u ténel tu chichcuntah u pucsiʼkaloʼobeʼ, ca tu yaʼalahoʼob baʼaloʼob tu contra Moises yétel Hahal Dios. Quex beyoʼ a woheʼleʼexeʼ tu yoʼolal u sén nohoch páhtalil Hahal Dios cah bisaʼaboʼob tiʼ le prometertaan luʼumoʼ.
17.43: Beʼoraaʼ, cu dzoʼocol tulácal leloʼ, dzoʼoc u kuchul tu kinil u chuchʼanil u kastaloʼob, maʼ in woheʼl wá maʼ taitac u xuʼululoʼob tiʼ le kinoʼobaʼ. Tumen in woheʼl hach tu hahil yan u kuchul u kinil u xuʼulsaʼaloʼob, yételeʼ chén yan dzeʼedzecoʼob cun bisbiloʼob esclavoʼoboʼ.
17.44: Le betiʼc túneʼ, Yumtsileʼ tu yaʼalah tiʼ in tataeʼ ca hókoc u bin ich kaxoʼ, le tún le Judioʼoboʼ tu yótah u quínsoʼob; beyoʼ, beyxann teʼex dzoʼoc a wóltiʼqueʼex a beteʼex beyoʼ; le betiʼqueʼ ca quínsiqueʼex maʼc ta tuculeʼex, yételeʼ beyeʼex heʼebix letiʼoʼoboʼ.
17.45: Séb ca betiʼqueʼex keban baʼaleʼ cu xántal a kaʼahsiqueʼex a Dioseʼex. Dzoʼoc a wiliqueʼex huntúl angeleʼ, letiʼ tu tʼanaheʼex. Beyoʼ dzoʼoc a wuʼuyiqueʼex u tsicbal yaʼab u ténel, yételeʼ dzoʼoc u tʼaniqueʼex yétel humpʼél chanbel tʼan, baʼaleʼ dzoʼoc u saʼataal teʼex le u páhtalil a wuʼuyiqueʼex tiʼoʼ, le betiʼqueʼ maʼ páhchah a wuʼuyiqueʼex le baʼax cu yaʼalicoʼ; le betiʼqueʼ kabét u tʼaniqueʼex yétel tʼan bey tiʼ u lémbal chác cu humeʼ, cu betiʼc u títiʼcuba luʼum bey bin u kaʼam hádzaʼaleʼ.
17.46: Teʼexeʼ a woheʼleʼex tu yoʼolal u páhtalil u sén nohoch tʼaneʼ cu páhtal u betiʼc u saʼatal luʼum, beyoʼ, tu yoʼolal u ca táxchahacoʼob, yétel cu páhtal u betiʼc u nohochtal caʼanal le táx luʼumoʼoboʼ. Baʼaxtén tún hach chich a pucsiʼkaleʼex?
17.47: Ta woʼolaleʼexeʼ yahchahaʼan in wól, hach yah in pucsiʼkal tumen sahquen ca puʼuluqueʼex minaʼan u xul u kinil. Heʼel túnaʼ hach chupen yétel u pixan Hahal Dioseʼ, minaʼan u muk in wínclil.
17.48: Le ca tún h dzoʼoc in wáʼalic tiʼoʼob beyaʼ, h kuxilnahoʼob tiʼn woʼolaleʼ, ca tu yóltahoʼob u pulenoʼob tu tamil le kaʼnaboʼ. Baʼaleʼ le cah nádzoʼob tiʼn wicnal utiaʼal u maʼchiquenoʼobeʼ, ca wáʼalahlen tán in wáʼalic tiʼoʼob: Tu kabaʼ Hahal Dios le yan tulácal páhtalil tiʼoʼ, quiʼn wáʼalic teʼexeʼ maʼ a maʼchiqueneʼex tumen chupen yétel u pixan Hahal Dios tac u yiʼibil in bakel; heʼemaʼxac wá cu maʼchiqueneʼ cu tiʼiʼquiʼl bey humpʼél xíw tiʼquiʼneʼ; le maʼxoʼ bín ilaʼac bey mixbaʼal letiʼ tu tán u páhtalil Hahal Dioseʼ, tumen Hahal Dios cun u bet lob tiʼ.
17.49: Ten tún Nefieneʼ tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼobeʼ maʼ u deber u yaʼalic baʼal tu contra u tata; bey xaneʼ tiʼn wáʼalah ca meyahnacoʼob ca u yántenoʼob tumen Hahal Dios u yaʼalmaʼh ten ca in bet humpʼél barcooʼ.
17.50: Ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼob: Wá Hahal Dios cu yaʼalic ten caʼach ca in bet tulácal baʼaleʼ heʼel u páhtal in betiʼqueʼ. Wá cu yaʼalic ten ca in wáʼal tiʼ le haʼaʼ; sutaba luʼumil, cu sutiʼcuba; wá xan quiʼn wáʼalic tiʼ beyoʼ, bey bín betiʼloʼ.
17.51: Le betiʼc túneʼ wá Yumtsil yan tiʼ sénquech páhtalil tiʼ, yétel dzoʼoc xan u betiʼc yaʼabach baʼal cu háksic yól maʼc ichil u palal maʼqueʼ, Baʼaxtén maʼ únchac u páhtal u caʼansic ten in bet humpʼél barcoiʼ?
17.52: Ten tún Nefieneʼ tiʼn wáʼalah yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tiʼ in sucuʼunoʼob, le betiʼc túneʼ cah xaʼakpah u tuculoʼobeʼ maʼ h páhchah u núquiʼcoʼob ten mixbaʼaliʼ; mix tu yóltahoʼob u maʼchénoʼob yétel u yal u kaboʼob ichil yaʼabach kinoʼobiʼ. Maʼ tu yóltahoʼob u betoʼob leloʼ tumen sahacoʼob u tiʼiʼquiʼloʼob tiʼn tán tumen hach sén nohoch u páhtalil u pixan Hahal Dios; bey úchic u betiʼc u tuclicoʼoboʼ.
17.53: Ca tún tu yaʼalah ten Yumtsil: Tuʼchʼkabt tiʼ a sucuʼunoʼob, baʼaleʼ maʼ bín tiʼiʼquiʼcoʼob ta tán, sino quiʼn betiʼc u quiʼquiʼlanquiʼloʼob, cu yaʼalic Yumtsil; yan in betiʼc beyoʼ tu yoʼolal u yoheltiʼcoʼob ten Yumtsil u Hahal Diosiloʼob.
17.54: Ca tún tiʼn tuʼchʼubtah. Quiʼquiʼlanquiʼloʼob in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ yétel maʼ h tiʼiʼcoʼob tiʼn tániʼ, sino h betaab u títaaloʼob tumen Yumtsil, heʼebix tu yaʼalmaʼhileʼ.
17.55: Ca tún tu yaʼalahoʼob: Beʼoraaʼ c oheʼl hach tu hahileʼ yan Yumtsil ta wételeʼ, tumen c kahóltiʼc u páhtalil Yumtsil le tu betah c quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl. Cah chinahoʼob tiʼn woc utiaʼal u adorartiʼquenoʼob. Baʼaleʼ maʼ tiʼn chaʼah tiʼoʼobeʼ ca tiʼn wáʼalah tiʼoʼob: Teneʼ chén a wídzineʼexeʼ, le betiʼqueʼ adorarteʼex Yumtsil yétel uʼuy u tʼan a tataeʼex tu yoʼolal u páhtal u yaʼabtal a kinileʼex wáy teʼ luʼum bín dzaʼabac teʼex tumen a Hahal Dioseʼexoʼ.

18.1: Ca tún tu meyahtoʼob Yumtsileʼ cah binoʼob tiʼn wétel. Ca t dzah nucuch cheʼoʼob hach heʼlaʼan u formaʼil. Yaʼab u ténel cu yeʼesaʼal ten tumen Hahal Dios bix u deber in betiʼc le nucuch cheʼoʼob utiaʼal le barcooʼ.
18.2: Beyoʼ teneʼ, Nefieneʼ maʼ tiʼn dzah le cheʼoʼob heʼebix u betaal tumen maʼcoʼobeʼ mix tiʼn betah le barcooʼ heʼebix u betiʼc letiʼoʼoboʼ, sino tiʼn betah heʼebix tu yeʼesilac ten Yumtsileʼ, le betiʼqueʼ maʼ bey heʼebix suc u mentiʼc le maʼcoʼoboʼ.
18.3: Ten tún Nefieneʼ yaʼab u ténel quiʼn naʼacal yókol le caʼanal luʼumoʼ tu yoʼolal in kátiʼc tiʼ Yumtsil; le betiʼc túneʼ, letiʼ xaneʼ tu yeʼesah ten nucuch baʼaloʼob.
18.4: Le ca tún tiʼn dzoʼocsah le barcooʼ, heʼebix u yaʼalmaʼhil ten Yumtsileʼ, ca tu yilahoob in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ sén maʼalob yétel hach tu bel mentaanileʼ le betiʼqueʼ tu humillartubaoʼob tu tán Yumtsil tu caʼatén.
18.5: Ca tún h tal u tʼan Yumtsil tiʼn tataeʼ tán u yaʼalic tiʼ ca ococoʼon ichil le barcooʼ.
18.6: Tiʼ humpʼél hatscabkin, cu dzoʼocol c listocuntiʼc tulácal baʼaloʼobeʼ; yaʼabcach yich cheʼoʼob yétel bak t caxtah teʼ kaxoʼ, yaʼab cab yétel baʼaloʼob utiaʼal hantbil heʼebix u yaʼalmaʼhil toʼon Yumtsileʼ, cah ocoʼon ichil le barcooʼ yétel c cúch, c nekoʼob yétel tulácal le baʼaxoʼob c tasmaʼh t ételeʼ le cu páhtal u cuchic cada huntúl heʼebix chihaʼanileʼ; bey tún úchic c ocol teʼ ichil le barcooʼ, toʼon, c atanoʼob yétel c palal.
18.7: Tiʼn tata túneʼ h síh caʼatúl palal tiʼ ich kaxoʼ; u maʼs nohochil Jacob u kabaʼ, u maʼs chichanileʼ Jose.
18.8: Le tún cah dzoʼoc tún c ocol ichil le barcooʼ yétel tulácal baʼal utiaʼal c hantoʼ, tulácal le baʼaxoʼob h aʼalaʼab toʼon ca c chʼaʼoʼ cah hókoʼon yókol le haʼoʼ cah bisaʼaboʼon tumen le ikoʼ tu behil tac le prometertaan luʼumoʼ.
18.9: Cu dzoʼocol tún c bisaʼal tumen le ik ichil yaʼabach kinoʼ in sucuʼunoʼob yétel u yatanoʼobeʼ, beyxann u palal Ismaʼel, ca hoʼopʼ u kakas quiʼmaʼccunsic u yóloʼob, ca hoʼopʼ u kayoʼob u kakas ókotoʼob, tiʼ leloʼ cah tuʼub tiʼoʼob le páhtalil le tu bisoʼob tac teʼeloʼ, beyoʼ tu hach betoʼob baʼaloʼob yétel kakas tuculoʼob.
18.10: Ten tún Nefieneʼ ca hoʼopʼ in sahactal tumen maʼ xan ca kuʼuxuc Yumtsil t oʼolaliʼ yétel ca u hadzoʼon, tu yoʼolal c kebanoʼobeʼ ca u bet c búlul tu tamil le kaʼnaboʼ. Le betiʼc túneʼ ten Nefieneʼ ca hoʼopʼ in sén tsicbal tiʼoʼob, baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ cah kuxinahoʼob tiʼ teneʼ, ca tu yaʼalahoʼob: Maʼ c kát ca u betuba c ídzin c nohchil ichiloʼoniʼ.
18.11: Laman tún yétel Lemueleʼ ca tu maʼchachénoʼobeʼ ca tu kaxenoʼob yétel sumeʼ ca tu loxenoʼob, Yumtsileʼ tu chaʼah u betiʼcoʼob beyoʼ tu yoʼolal u dzoʼocsic le baʼax u yaʼalmaʼhoʼ tu yoʼolal le kakas maʼcoʼoboʼ.
18.12: Beyoʼ cu dzoʼocol u kaxtiʼquenoʼobeʼ, maʼ h páhchah in pécsquiʼnbaiʼ, tiʼ le sútucoʼ le baʼal wolis cu yeʼesicoʼon le behoʼ, u mentmaʼh Yumtsil c tiaʼaloʼ, tu pʼat u meyah.
18.13: Le betiʼqueʼ maʼ tu yoholoʼob tuʼux u deber u binoʼob yétel le barcooʼ. Ca tún h cáh humpʼél kaʼam chác yétel ik, beyoʼ humpʼél kaʼam chác yétel ik hach tu háksah c ól; beyoʼ; ca tu betah c sut t pach tiʼ óxpʼél kinoʼob; ca tún hoʼopʼ u sén sahactaloʼob de que bín búlucoʼoboʼ teʼ ichil le kaʼnaboʼ. Pero maʼ tu wáchʼcaheʼnoʼobiʼ.
18.14: Tu canpʼél kineʼ cah puʼuloʼon t pachil, le kaʼam chác yétel ikoʼ tán u maʼs kaʼamtal.
18.15: Hach taitac c búlul teʼ tu tamil le kaʼnaboʼ beyoʼ. Cu dzoʼocol c bisaʼal tiʼ canpʼél kineʼ, in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ ca hoʼopʼ u naʼatiʼcoʼobeʼ u juicio Hahal Dios yan yókoloʼob yételeʼ bín químicoʼob wá maʼ tu pʼatiʼcoʼob le baʼaxoʼob kastac tu betahoʼoboʼ. Le betiʼc túneʼ ca tu nadzubaoʼob tiʼn wicnaleʼ ca tu wáchʼahoʼob u kaxbil sumil tiʼn kab, heʼel túnaʼ dzoʼoc u hach chuʼupul, bey xan u cal in woc hach chup yétel hach yah.
18.16: Quex tumen beyoʼ teniʼ in dzamaʼh in wól tiʼ in Hahal Dios yételeʼ quiʼn quiʼquiʼtʼantiʼc búlkin, maʼ xan tiʼn wáʼalah baʼal tu contra Yumtsil tu yoʼolal u hach yahil in woc.
18.17: In tata Lehieʼ u yaʼalmaʼh yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tiʼ in sucuʼunoʼob, bey xan tiʼ u palal Ismaʼel baʼaleʼ letiʼoʼobeʼ cu yaʼalicoʼobeʼ bín u bet kas tiʼ heʼemaʼxac cu yántiʼqueneʼ. Tumen tún dzoʼoc u chʼíhil in tataoʼob yétel úchic u sén yahtal u yóloʼob tu yoʼolal u palaloʼobeʼ, cah kohaʼanchahoʼob, beyoʼ, cah anchah u pʼátaloʼob chilicbaloʼob yaʼabach kin.
18.18: Tu yoʼolal xan u yahiloʼob yétel u yayah ólaloʼob yétel tu yoʼolal u kasiʼl u cuxtal in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ, taitac u kubic u pixanoʼob tiʼ Hahal Dios beyoʼ, u saquiʼl u poloʼobeʼ hach taitac u dzaʼabal ich luʼum beyoʼ, hach taitac u puʼululoʼob in tataoʼob teʼ kaʼnaboʼ utiaʼal u muʼuculoʼob.
18.19: Jacob yétel Jose túneʼ, tumen hach tanquelenoʼobeʼ, kabét ca hanicoʼob cah yahchah u yóloʼob tu yóʼolal u yayah ólaloʼob u tataoʼob, mix in wátan cu yókol yétel u kátiʼc tiʼ Hahal Dios mix in palal páhchah u kexic u pucsiʼkal in sucuʼunoʼob ca u wáchʼenoʼob.
18.20: Mixbaʼal chén u páhtalil Hahal Dios taitac u xuʼulsicoʼobeʼ cah páhchah u kexic u pucsiʼkaloʼobeʼ, le tún ca tu yilahoʼob hach bin buʼulucoʼob teʼ tu tamil le kaʼnaboʼ ca tu kexic u yóloʼob tiʼ le baʼax tu betahoʼob tenoʼ ca tu wáchʼaheʼnoʼob.
18.21: Cu dzoʼocol tún u wáchʼiquenoʼobeʼ heʼel túnaʼ ca tiʼn chʼaʼah le baʼax wolis cu yeʼesic le behoʼ ca hoʼopʼ u meyah heʼebix tiʼn wóltilʼaqueʼ, ca tún h orarnaheʼn tiʼ Yumtsil, cu dzoʼocol in orareʼ cah dzoʼoc le kaʼam chácoʼ cah anchah mix humpʼít ik mix chác.
18.22: Ten tún Nefieneʼ ca tiʼn guiartah le barcooʼ ca hoʼopʼ c bin tu caʼatén tiʼ le prometertaan luʼumoʼ.
18.23: Cu dzoʼocol tún c bin yókol haʼ tiʼ yaʼabach kinoʼobeʼ cah kuchoʼon teʼ luʼum prometertaanoʼ, cah émoʼoneʼ ca t wédzcuntah c otoch le mentaan yétel nokoʼ; cu t dzah u kabaʼeʼ u prometertaan luʼumil.
18.24: Ca tún hoʼopʼ c meyahtiʼc le luʼumoʼ, ca hoʼopʼ c pakal, beyoʼ, t pakah tulácal le nekoʼob t tasmaʼh cah lukoʼon Jerusalenoʼ, ca tún anchah u sén nuctaloʼob ca tu dzah toʼon yaʼab baʼaloʼob Hahal Dios.
18.25: Caʼaliquiʼl tún tán c bin teʼ kaxoʼ teʼ prometertaan luʼumoʼ, ca t ilah u heʼheʼlásil baʼalcheʼoʼob teʼ káxoʼ wácax, tsíminoʼob, queh, yétel tulácal u heʼheʼlásil baʼalcheʼoʼob kabét tiʼ maʼc, t caxtah xan u heʼheʼlásil baʼaloʼob yan ich luʼum bey heʼebix oro, plata yétel cobreoʼ.

1.intro: Utsicbalil úchic u químil Lehi, cu kúxul u sucuʼunoʼob Nefi tu yoʼolaleʼ. Yumtsileʼ cu yaʼalic tiʼ Nefi ca hókoc ca xiʼic ich kaxoʼ. U xímbal ich kaxoʼ, etc.
1.1: Ten tún Nefieneʼ, le cah dzoʼ oc in caʼansic in sucuʼunoʼobeʼ, c tata Lehieʼ, tu yaʼalah xan dzeʼedzec tʼanoʼob tiʼoʼobʼ letiʼ le yaʼabach baʼaloʼob tu mentah Yumtsil utiaʼal u hóksaʼaloʼob tu luʼumil Jerusalenoʼ.
1.2: Ca tún tu yaʼalah tiʼoʼob tu yoʼolal u líkiʼloʼob utiaʼal baʼatel yókol le kaʼnaboʼ yétel tu chʼaʼ ótsilil tiʼoʼob Hahal Dios tu yoʼolal maʼ u químiloʼob ichil le kaʼnaboʼ.
1.3: Tu yaʼalah tiʼoʼob xan tu yoʼolal le u luʼumil prometertaan dzu kamicoʼoboʼ; yétel yaʼab cu chʼaʼic ótsilil Yumtsil tiʼ toʼon ca tu yaʼalah toʼon ca hókocoʼon tu cahil Jerusalen.
1.4: Tumen heʼel túnaʼ dzoʼoc in wilic humpʼél vision, cu tʼan tiʼoʼob: Betiʼqueʼ in woheʼl Jerusaleneʼ dzoʼoc u xuʼulsaʼal, tu yoʼolaleʼ wá pʼátacoʼon caʼacheʼ úch químicoʼon xan caʼacheʼ.
1.5: Baʼaleʼ, tu yaʼalaheʼ quex sén yahchahoʼoneʼ dzoʼoc u yantal toʼon humpʼél luʼum prometertaan, humpʼél luʼum yéyaʼan ichil tulácal ulʼakoʼob, le heʼeloʼ heʼebix u prometertmaʼhil Hahal Dios tiʼ teneʼ bín pʼátac humpʼél luʼum bín pʼaʼatac tu palal in palaloʼob. Beyoʼ Yumtsileʼ tu yoʼolal convenio u dzamaʼh ten le luʼumaʼ yétel tiʼ in palal tiʼ tulácal kinoʼob, yétel utiaʼal xan le ulak maʼcoʼob tulak cahiloʼob bín taasac tumen u kab Yumtsiloʼ.
1.6: Ten Lehieneʼ quiʼn wáʼalic le baʼax bín úchucoʼ heʼebix u yeʼesic ten le pixan tiʼ tenoʼ, mixmaʼc bín talac wáy tiʼ le Iuʼumaʼ wá maʼ tu taasal tumen u kab Yumtsiloʼ.
1.7: Le betiʼqueʼ, le luʼumaʼ taacaʼan utiaʼal u dzaʼabal tiʼ le maʼxoʼob quen u tas wáyaʼ. Wá xan cu meyahtiʼcoʼob Hahal Dios heʼebix u yaʼalic u tʼan u dzamaʼhoʼ, bín beychahac bey humpʼél u luʼum halabil tiʼoʼoboʼ; le betiʼqueʼ mix bikin bín bisaʼacoʼob beyoʼ; baʼaleʼ wá ca bisaʼacoʼobeʼ, leloʼ bín úchuc tu yoʼolal u kebanoʼ tumen wá yan yaʼab kebaneʼ bey esclavoʼoboʼ bín kaschahac le luʼumaʼ tu contraoʼoboʼ, baʼaleʼ utiaʼal le toh u cuxtaloʼoboʼ lailiʼ quen u betuba bendecirtbil utiaʼaloʼob.
1.8: Heʼel túnaʼ, le luʼumaʼ maʼs maʼalob maʼ u kahóltaal tumen ulak cahoʼob, tumen heʼel túnaʼ yaʼab cahoʼobeʼ, heʼel u binoʼob tulácal tuʼux tiʼ le luʼumaʼ, tu yoʼolaleʼ maʼ tán u yantal humpʼél utsil luʼum utiaʼal u dzaʼabal maʼc.
1.9: Tu yoʼolaleʼ ten Nefieneʼ dzoʼoc u yantal ten u promesaoʼ, wá le maʼxoʼob bín bisaʼacoʼob tumen Yumtsil desde u cahil Jerusalen cu betiʼcoʼob le tʼan Yumtsiloʼ, bín yaʼabchahacoʼob yókol le luʼumaʼ; yétel maʼ bín ohéltaacoʼob tumen ulak cahoʼoboʼ, tu yoʼolal u páhtal u yantal tiʼoʼob le luʼumaʼ hach utiaʼaloʼob chén letiʼoʼob. Wá xan cu betiʼcoʼob u tʼaneʼ, bín bendecirtaacoʼob yókol le luʼumaʼ; maʼ bín anac maʼc utiaʼal chaʼic u pʼuʼusiloʼob wá utiaʼal u lubsic u luʼumil u kamaʼhoʼobiʼ, hach maʼalob bín cahlacoʼob minaʼan u xul u kiniloʼob.
1.10: Baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ le quen kuchuc kin u pʼatiʼcoʼob u creertoʼobeʼ le cu dzoʼocol u kamicoʼob nucuch bendicionoʼob tu kab Yumtsil, dzoʼoc u yohelitcoʼob bix betaabic yókolcab yétel bix betaabic tulácal maʼcoʼob, dzoʼoc u kahóltiʼcoʼob u nucuch meyahoʼob Yumtsil le cu haʼasic c óloʼoboʼ le cah betaab le yókolcabaʼ dzoʼoc u kamicoʼob u páhtalil u betiʼcoʼob tulácal baʼaloʼob tu yoʼolal u feil, yan tiʼoʼob le maʼndamientoʼoboʼ desde cah dzoʼoc xan u guiartaaloʼob tumen le u yutsil minaʼan u xuloʼ tac wáy tiʼ le luʼum prometertaanaʼ, heʼel túnaʼ quiʼn wáʼaliqueʼ wá ca kuchuc le kin maʼ u kamicoʼob le u Sagrado Máquiʼl Israeloʼ, le Mesias tu hahiloʼ, le maʼx cu salvartiʼcoʼoboʼ yétel u Diosiloʼob, heʼel túnaʼ, u juicioil le maʼx tohoʼ bín émec yókoloʼob.
1.11: Bixmaʼiʼ, bín u tas yókoloʼobeʼ ulak cahoʼob, tiʼ le maʼxoʼoboʼ bín u dza páhtalil tiʼoʼob, yétel bín u luʼs tiʼobbeʼ le luʼum utiaʼaloʼobaʼ yétel bín u ment u betaal lob tiʼoʼob yétel bín kiʼkiʼtaacoʼob.
1.12: Bixmaʼiʼ tiʼ u palal yétel tiʼ u palal u palaleʼ bín anac u weʼequel kiʼik yétel nucuch lobosoʼob; tu yoʼolaleʼ in palaleʼexeʼ in kát ca a kaʼahs teʼex, beyoʼ, ca wuʼuyeʼex in tʼan.
1.13: Quexieʼ ca anac a wáhaleʼex; ca áhaqueʼex tiʼ humpʼél tam wenel, bey tiʼ le u wenelil u metnal yétel ca wáchʼabaeʼex tiʼ le kakas cadenaoʼob le dzu kaxiqueʼexoʼ tumen letiʼoʼob le cu kaxic u palal maʼcoʼoboʼ, ca bisaʼacobb bey esclavoʼoboʼ tiʼ u tam holil le kasoʼ yétel le yayah ólal minaʼan u xuloʼ.
1.14: Aheʼneʼex; líkeneʼex teʼ luʼumoʼ, uʼuyeʼex u tʼan huntúl a tataeʼex tiʼn quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl, in wínclileʼ maʼ tán u xántaal quen a dzaeʼex ten teʼ sís luʼumoʼ tuʼux mix humpʼél hum cu hókoliʼ, tiʼ teʼeloʼ mixmaʼc cu sutiʼ; ichil dzeʼedzec kineʼ yan in xímbal le beh yókolcabaʼ.
1.15: Baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ, Yumtsileʼ dzoʼoc u salvartiʼc in pixan tiʼ u cúchil tiʼcnal quiʼsinoʼ, dzoʼoc in wilic u gloriail yétel baʼpachtaanen ichil u kabil u yacunah.
1.16: Le baʼax quiʼn dzíboltiʼcoʼ letiʼ ca kaʼahac teʼex a hach betiʼqueʼex u tʼan yétel u juicio Yumtsil; heʼel túnaʼ, lelaʼ letiʼ le baʼax cu dzíboltiʼc in pixanoʼ desde úchi.
1.17: In pucsiʼkaleʼ hach yahchahaʼan yaʼab u ténel, tumen quiʼn tucliqueʼ tu yoʼolal chich a pucsiʼkaleʼexeʼ, Yumtsil a Hahal Dioseʼexeʼ heʼel u yantal u tal ta wicnaleʼex yétel tulácal u kuxil, tumen beyoʼ heʼel a puʼululeʼexeʼ yétel heʼel a xuʼulsaʼaleʼex minaʼan u xul.
1.18: Wá ca lúbuc ta wókoleʼex humpʼél kas tán bín anac tiʼ yaʼabach u palal a palaloʼob; ca xímbalnaqueʼex yétel le tadz maʼscaboʼ yétel wiʼih, ca chʼaʼabac kuxil ta woʼolaleʼex yétel ca bisaʼaqueʼex heʼebix u yóltiʼc yétel u betiʼc teʼex esclavoeʼexil kasiʼl baʼal.
1.19: Quexieʼ in palaleʼex, maʼ tu yúchul teʼex lelaʼ, sino ca beychaqueʼex u yeyaʼan cahil Yumtsil. Baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ ca betaac le baʼax cu yóltiʼc Yumtsiloʼ, tumen u beloʼobeʼ lailiʼ tohtac.
1.20: Beyxaneʼ letiʼ dzoʼoc u yaʼaliqueʼ: Caʼaliquiʼl tán a wuʼuyiqueʼex in tʼanoʼobeʼ bín bendecirtaaqueʼex tiʼ le luʼumaʼ; baʼaleʼ wá maʼ tán a betiʼqueʼexeʼ bín puʼuluqueʼex tiʼn tán.
1.21: Beʼoraʼ túneʼ tu yoʼolal u páhtal u quiʼmaʼcchahal in wól ta woʼolaleʼex yétel ca hókoc teʼ yókolcabaʼ in pucsiʼkal yétel quiʼmaʼc ólal ta woʼolaleʼexeʼ, tu yoʼolal maʼ u yantal in bisaʼal yétel yayah ólal tiʼ le sís luʼumoʼ, líkeneʼex teʼ ichil le luʼumoʼ ca beychaqueʼex bey xíbileʼex ca anac chén humpʼéliliʼ tuculeʼex yétel humpʼéliliʼ pucsiʼkaleʼex, muchʼucbaleʼex tiʼ tulácal baʼaloʼob tu yoʼolal maʼ a bisaʼaleʼex bey esclavoeʼex.
1.22: Tu yoʼolal maʼ a kascuntaaleʼex yétel wábaʼax kas tʼan, mix xan a tetiʼqueʼex u pʼuʼuhul Hahal Dios le maʼx tohoʼ ta wókoleʼex utiaʼal a xuʼululeʼex, beyoʼ le u xuʼulul wínclil yétel pixan minaʼan u xuloʼ.
1.23: Aheʼneʼex in palaleʼex; búquiʼnteʼex ichil le nok hach toh u cuxtaloʼ, wáchʼabaeʼex tiʼ le u cadenailoʼob kaxmaʼhileʼexoʼ; hókeneʼex teʼ ichil le eʼhochʼeʼeniloʼ yétel líkeneʼex tiʼ luʼumoʼ.
1.24: Maʼ a líkiʼleʼex kuxbileʼex tu yoʼolal a wídzineʼexeʼ le baʼax u yilmaʼh letiʼoʼ hach yaʼab u páhtalileʼ, letiʼeʼ dzu betiʼc le tʼan Hahal Dios desde le kin cah hókoʼon Jerusalenoʼ yételeʼ h guiartaab tumen u kab Hahal Dios utiaʼal u tasicoʼon wáy tu luʼumil prometertaanaʼ; tumen wá maʼ tu yoʼolal Ietiʼeʼ dzoʼoc caʼach c químil yétel wiʼih teʼ kaxoʼ, le cu dzoʼocoleʼ ta wóltaheʼex a quínseʼex, beyoʼ dzoʼoc u yantal tiʼ yaʼabach yayah ólal ta woʼolaleʼex.
1.25: Sahquen yétel quiʼn quiʼquiʼlanquiʼl ta woʼolaleʼexeʼ ca anac u yahtal u yól maʼs; tumen heʼel túnaʼ ta tacaheʼex u pol tán a wáʼaliqueʼexeʼ u kát letiʼ ca anac páhtalil tiʼ yétel autoridad ta wókoleʼex, baʼaleʼ teneʼ in wóheʼleʼ maʼ u caxtmaʼh páhtalil mix autoridad ta wókoleʼexiʼ; sino chén u dzamaʼh u tucul tiʼ u meyahil Hahal Dios yétel ca bendecirtaaqueʼex minaʼan u xul.
1.26: Dzoʼoc xan a wáʼaliqueʼex baʼal tu contra tumen letiʼeʼ toh cu tsicbatiʼc teʼex. Ca wáʼaliqueʼexeʼ hach cu yaʼalic chich tʼan tiʼ teʼex, kuxilnah tiʼ teʼex, baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ u chichileʼ letiʼ u mukil u páhtalil u tʼan Hahal Dios yan caʼach tiʼ letiʼoʼ. Le baʼax ca wáʼaliqueʼex u kuxiloʼ, letiʼ chén le hahiloʼ, heʼebix le yan tiʼ Hahal Diosoʼ, tumen letiʼeʼ maʼ páhchah u quiʼquiʼtʼan u yaʼalic teʼex yétel tulácal u yól yoʼolal a kebaneʼex.
1.27: Hach kabét ca anac u páhtalil Hahal Dios yétel, quex ca anac u yaʼaliqueʼex humpʼél baʼax ca a wuʼuyeʼex u tʼan. Tumen ilawileʼexeʼ, maʼ letiʼ tu betiʼ, sino letiʼ le u pixan Yumtsil yan tiʼ letiʼ caʼachoʼ, letiʼ heʼel u chaʼah a wídzin ca tʼanaqueʼ maʼ h páhchah u maʼquiʼc u chiʼiʼ.
1.28: Beʼoraʼ túneʼ, in pal, Laman, beyxann teʼex Lemuel yétel Sam beyxann teʼex in palaleʼex, tumen u palaleʼex Ismaʼel, heʼel túnaʼ, wá ca wuʼuyiqueʼex u tʼan Nefieʼ, maʼ bin químiqueʼexiʼ. Wá xan ca wuʼuyiqueʼexeʼ, bín in pʼat teʼex in bendicion, bixmaʼiʼ in yáx bendicion.
1.29: Baʼaleʼ wá maʼ a káteʼex a wuʼuyiqueʼex u tʼaneʼ bín in luʼs in yáx bendicion, bixmaʼiʼ in bendicion, ca pʼaʼatac yókol letiʼ.
1.30: Beʼoraeʼ Zoram quiʼn tʼaniquech tech. Heʼel túnaʼ, tech u meyhulech Laban. Quex beyoʼ tu cahil Jerusalen h hóksaʼabech yétel xan in woheʼleʼ techeʼ u hahil ámigo in pal Nefi minaʼan u xul.
1.31: Le betiʼqueʼ tumen dzoʼoc a dzaic a wóleʼ bín bendecirtaac u palal a palal yétel le utiaʼal letiʼoʼ yétel bín cahlacoʼob yaʼabach kin wáy yókol le luʼumaʼ; haʼali tu yoʼolal u kebaneʼ wá maʼeʼ mixbaʼal bín molestaroʼob mix u betiʼc kas tiʼoʼob u palal a palal wáy tiʼ le luʼumaʼ teʼ kinoʼob minaʼan u xuloʼ a menos que u kastal u toh cuxtaloʼob.
1.32: Bey túnoʼ wá ca dzoʼocsic u tán Yumtsileʼ, letiʼ bín u taac le luʼumaʼ chén utiaʼal u maʼalob cuxtal u palal a palal yétel u palal u palal in pal.

2.1: Beʼoraaʼ Jacob bín in caʼah in tʼan ta wétel. Tech in yáx palech síheʼch tiʼ u kinil in yayah ólal teʼ kaxoʼ. Heʼel túnaʼ dzoʼoc u yantal tech yayah ólal ta palil tu yoʼolal hach chich u tuculoʼob a sucuʼunoʼob.
2.2: Quex beyoʼ, Jacob in yáx pal síheʼch teʼ kaxoʼ, tech a kahól u nohoch utsil Hahal Dios. Letiʼ bín u bendecirt a yah ólal ca u yántech.
2.3: Le betiʼqueʼ bín bendecirtaac a wól, bín cuxlaquech tiʼ maʼalob cuxtal yétel a sucuʼun Nefi, u kinil a cuxtaleʼ bín anac tu meyah Hahal Dios. Tu yoʼolaleʼ in woheʼl tu yoʼolal u yutsil le maʼx cu salvartiʼquechoʼ dzoʼoc a salvartaal, tumen dzoʼoc a wilic hach tu chuʼupul le kinoʼoboʼ bín talac utiaʼal u salvartiʼc maʼc.
2.4: Ta tanquelmileʼ ta wilah u gloriail, le betiʼqueʼ bendecirtaanech heʼebix xan bín bendecirtaac le maʼxoʼob bín u meyaht tu bakeloʼ; tumen le pixanoʼ igual, heʼebix hóleaqueʼ bey behlaʼeʼ bey le kinoʼob maʼ tu xuʼululoʼoboʼ. Le beh xanoʼ h betaabaʼan antes le cah lúb maʼcoʼ beyoʼ salvacioneʼ maʼ kabét a boʼotiʼc ca anac techiʼ.
2.5: Le maʼcoʼoboʼ cu canicoʼob u yaʼabil utiaʼal u yéyicoʼob baʼal maʼalob wá baʼal kasoʼ. Le leyoʼ cu dzaʼabal tiʼ maʼcoʼob. Tu yoʼolal le leyoʼ mix humpʼél bak cu defendertiʼcuba, u kát yaʼaleʼ tu yoʼolal le leyoʼ cu puʼulul maʼc. Beyoʼ, tu yoʼolal le u leyil yókolcaboʼ cu puʼulul; yétel tu yoʼolal xan le u leyil le pixanoʼ cu químil tiʼ le baʼax maʼaloboʼ cu pʼátaloʼob hach ótsiloʼob minaʼan u xul u kiniliʼ.
2.6: Tu yoʼolaleʼ, le salvacionoʼ cu tal tiʼ tu yoʼolal le Sagrado Mesiasoʼ; tumen chup yétel utsil yétel hah.
2.7: Heʼel túnaʼ letiʼeʼ cu dzaicuba bey humpʼél sacrificio tu yoʼolal le kebanoʼ, tu yoʼolal u dzoʼocsic le baʼax u kát le leyoʼ tu yoʼolal le maʼxoʼob yah tu pucsiʼkaloʼoboʼ yétel hach sincero u pixanoʼoboʼ; beyoʼ tu yoʼolal mix ulak maʼc cu dzoʼocsaʼal le baʼax u kát le leyoʼ.
2.8: Tu yoʼolaleʼ hach sénquech kabét ca kahóltaac le baʼaloʼob tumen u maʼquiʼloʼob le yókolcabaʼ tu yoʼolal u yoheltiʼcoʼobeʼ mix humpʼél bak heʼel u páhtal u cahtal tu tánil Hahal Dios wá maʼ tu yoʼolal u chʼaʼic ótsilil yétel u dzaʼabal tiʼ tumen le Sagrado Mesiasoʼ, maʼx cu dzaic u cuxtaliʼl u bakeleʼ, cu dzoʼocoleʼ cu caʼa chʼaʼic tu caʼatén tu yoʼolal u páhtalil le Pixanoʼ utiaʼal u betiʼc ca úchuc le u caʼa cuxtal tiʼ le quiʼmenoʼoboʼ, yételeʼ letiʼ le yáx maʼx bín caʼa cuxlacoʼ.
2.9: Bey túnoʼ letiʼeʼ u yáxil ich tiʼ Hahal Dios, tumen letiʼ bín u dzauba chúmuc toʼon yétel tiʼ Hahal Dios tu yoʼolal tulácal u palal maʼc; yételeʼ le cun u creertoʼob tiʼ letiʼeʼ bín salvartaacoʼob.
2.10: Tu yoʼolal tún le sacrificio cu mentiʼc tu yoʼolal tulácal maʼcoʼ, tulácal maʼc cu bin tu yicnal Hahal Dios; bey túnoʼ bín anacoʼob tu tán tu yoʼolal u juzgartaaloʼob tumen letiʼ tiʼ le hahoʼ yétel le u yutsil yan tiʼ letiʼoʼ. Tu yoʼolaleʼ le baʼax cu kátiʼc le ley dzaʼan tumen le Sagrado Mácoʼ, letiʼ u dzaʼabal le keyah cu tal yételoʼ, le xan le keyah heʼelaʼ, yan actán tiʼ le quiʼmaʼc ólal cu tal yételoʼ tu yoʼolal u dzoʼocsic le baʼax u kát le u sacrificioil Jesucristooʼ.
2.11: Tumen kach kabét ca anac humpʼél baʼal cu bin tu contra cada baʼal. Tumen wá maʼbeyoʼ, in yáx palech h síh teʼ kaxoʼ, beyoʼ minaʼan uts mix kaseʼ, mix utsil cuxtal mix ótsilileʼ, mix uts mix kas. Tu yoʼolal túneʼ tulácal baʼaloʼobeʼ hach kabét ca sunacoʼob humpʼélil caʼachiʼ wá ca sunacoʼob humpʼélil túneʼ maʼ tán u yantal caʼach u cuxtal mix u químileʼ, mix u kastal mix u yutstaleʼ, mix quiʼmaʼc ólal, mix yah ólaleʼ, mix u naʼatiʼl mix u xaʼaxakaʼan tuculeʼ.
2.12: Tu yoʼolal túneʼ, minaʼan u baʼax oʼolalil u betaal caʼachoʼ, beyoʼ h betaab bey humpʼél baʼal minaʼan u valoriʼ. Beyoʼ dzoʼoc caʼach u xuʼulsic u naʼatiʼl Hahal Dios yétel u tucul minaʼan u xuleʼ heʼebix xan u páhtalil yétel u chʼaʼic ótsilil yétel u yutsil Hahal Dios.
2.13: Tumen wá ca wáʼaliqueʼex minaʼan leyeʼ ca wáʼaliqueʼex xaneʼ minaʼan keban. Wá xan ca wáʼaliqueʼex minaʼan kebaneʼ, ca wáʼaliqueʼex xaneʼ minaʼan uts. Wá minaʼan utseʼ minaʼan quiʼmaʼc ólal. Wá minaʼan uts mix quiʼmaʼc ólaleʼ, minaʼan xan castiʼgo mix yah ólal. Wá minaʼan xan le baʼaloʼobaʼ minaʼan xan Hahal Dioseʼ, minaʼanoʼon xan toʼon, mix luʼum; tumen maʼ tu páhtal u yantal u betaal baʼaloʼob mix utiaʼal meyah mix utiaʼal u kamic u meyah; tu yoʼolaleʼ tulácal dzoʼoc caʼach u láh saʼataleʼ.
2.14: Beʼoraʼ túnaʼ in palaleʼex quiʼn wáʼalic teʼex le baʼaloʼobaʼ tu yoʼolal u dzaic teʼex utsil yétel u caniqueʼex; tumen yan huntúl Dios maʼx h bet tulácal baʼal teʼ caʼanoʼ, yókolcab yétel tulácal le baʼaxoʼob yan yókoloʼ; heʼebix le baʼaxoʼob cu meyahoʼoboʼ beyxann le baʼaxoʼob kamic u meyahoʼ.
2.15: Tu yoʼolal tún cu dzoʼocol le baʼax u tuculmaʼh minaʼan u xuloʼ tu yókol maʼqueʼ, le cah dzoʼoc u betiʼc c yáx tataoʼobeʼ, u baʼalcheʼiloʼob káx, u chʼíchʼiloʼob teʼ caʼanoʼ, hach tulácal le baʼaxoʼob h mentaaboʼ, hach kaʼanaʼan caʼach ca anac humpʼél baʼax tu contra cada baʼax, bixmaʼiʼ, letiʼ le u yich le cheʼ aʼalaʼan maʼ u hantaaloʼ cu contra u yich le u cheʼil cuxtaloʼ, humpʼéleʼ chʼuhucoʼ ulʼakeʼ káh.
2.16: Tu yoʼolal túneʼ, le Yumstiʼl Hahal Diosoʼ tu chaʼah u yéyic maʼc u behil tu hun. Bey túnoʼ maʼqueʼ maʼ tán u páhtal u yéyic u behil tu hun, wá maʼ uts tu tán humpʼél wá ulʼak.
2.17: Ten tún Lehieneʼ, bey u yaʼalic le baʼax dzoʼoc in xoquiʼcoʼ, huntúl u angel Hahal Dios h lúb teʼ caʼanoʼ heʼebix dzíbtaaniloʼ; tu yoʼolaleʼ tu betuba quiʼsin, tumen u kat u betiʼc baʼal kas tu tán Hahal Dios.
2.18: Tu yoʼolal tún úch u lúbul teʼ caʼanoʼ yétel tu yoʼolal úch u kuchul u betuba hach kasaʼan minaʼan u xul u kasiʼleʼ, tu dzahuba u betiʼc ca anac yah ólal tiʼ maʼcoʼob tu yoʼolaleʼ le úchben canoʼ, letiʼ le quiʼsinoʼ, u tata tulácal tusoʼob, tu yaʼalah tiʼ Evaeʼ, hant u yich le cheʼ aʼalaʼan tech maʼ ta hantiʼ, maʼ tán a químil, sino bín beychaquech bey Dioseʼ, a kahól uts yétel kas.
2.19: Adan yétel Eva tún le cah dzoʼoc u hantiʼcoʼob u yich le cheʼ aʼalaʼan tiʼoʼob maʼ tu hantoʼobiʼ cah puʼuloʼob tu jardin Eden, tu yoʼolal u meyahtiʼc luʼum.
2.20: Ca tún anchah u palaloʼob, beyoʼ u familiail yókolcab.
2.21: Ca tún yaʼabchah u haʼabiloʼob u palal maʼcoʼob, heʼebix u yóltiʼc Hahal Dioseʼ, tu yoʼolal u pʼatiʼcoʼob u keban caʼaliquiʼl cuxaʼanoʼob tu bakeloʼob tiʼ yanoʼob; tu yoʼolal túneʼ u cuxtaleʼ h kexpah tiʼ humpʼél u cuxtal utiaʼal u paʼtiʼcoʼob, u kinileʼ yaʼabchahiʼ heʼebix u tʼan Yumtsil Hahal Dios dzamaʼh tiʼ u palal maʼcoʼobeʼ. Tumen letiʼeʼ tu yeʼesah tiʼ tulácal maʼcoʼobeʼ dzu puʼululoʼob tu yoʼolal u betiʼcoʼob kas u tataoʼob.
2.22: Tumen wá maʼ úchic u betiʼc keban Adaneʼ, maʼ tán caʼach u lúbuleʼ, sino dzoʼoc caʼach u pʼátal tu jardin Edenoʼ. Tulácal tún le baʼaxoʼob h betaaboʼ dzoʼoc caʼach u pʼátal hach heʼebix le cah dzoʼoc u betaaleʼ; dzoʼoc xan caʼach u pʼátal minaʼan u xuleʼ.
2.23: Maʼ xan tán caʼach u yantal u palaloʼobeʼ; tu yoʼolaleʼ dzoʼoc caʼach u pʼátaloʼob tiʼ humpʼél cuxtal mixbaʼal u yoheʼloʼobeʼ, xmaʼ quiʼmaʼc ólal, tumen maʼ u kahóloʼob ótsilil; maʼ tu betiʼcoʼob baʼal maʼalob tumen maʼ u kahóloʼob kebaniʼ.
2.24: Baʼaleʼ heʼel túnaʼ, tulácal le baʼaloʼoboʼ dzoʼoc u betaal tu naʼatiʼl le maʼx tulácal baʼal u yoheʼloʼ.
2.25: Adan h lúb ca anac maʼcoʼobeʼ; beyxannoʼ yan maʼcoʼob ca quiʼmaʼcchahac u yóloʼob.
2.26: Le tún le Mesiasoʼ yan u tal le quen kuchuc hach u yaʼabil u kinil, utiaʼal u salvartiʼc u palal maʼcoʼob tiʼ le u lúbul maʼcoʼ. Yétel tumen xan salvartaanoʼob tiʼ le u lúbul maʼcoʼ, cu pʼátaloʼob hálkabiloʼob minaʼan u xul u kiniliʼ, tán u kahóltiʼcoʼob baʼax uts yétel baʼax kas tu yoʼolal u bisicoʼob u cuxtaloʼob chén tu hunoʼob, beyoʼ maʼ ca luʼsaʼac u hálkabil cuxtaloʼobiʼ, a menos que letiʼ u keyahil le ley teʼ tu hach nohchil dzoʼoc kinoʼ, heʼebix u tʼan Hahal Dios u dzamaʼheʼ.
2.27: Bey túnoʼ le maʼcoʼoboʼ hálkaboʼob u bisicoʼob u cuxtaloʼob tiʼ bakel yétel dzaʼan tiʼoʼob tulácal baʼal hach kabét utiaʼal maʼc.
